and&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL602  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4019><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4010><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4011><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>overall 
economic conditions.</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 54pt" id=PARA603><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK3995 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR3995 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM3995 >S-
17</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR3995 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA3995.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px">&nbsp;<FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Lower oil and natural gas prices may not only decrease 
our revenues on a per unit basis, but may also reduce the amount of oil and 
natural gas we can produce economically, if any, and, as such, may have a 
negative impact on our reserves. A continuation of low or significant declines 
in oil and natural gas prices may materially affect our future business, 
financial condition, results of operations, liquidity and borrowing capacity, 
and may require a reduction in the carrying value of our oil and gas properties.
While our revenues may increase if prevailing oil and gas prices increase 
significantly, exploration and production costs and acquisition costs for 
additional properties and reserves may also increase.&nbsp; We currently do not 
enter into hedging arrangements or use derivative financial instruments such as 
crude oil forward and swap contracts to hedge our risk associated with 
fluctuations in commodity prices.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA605><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA606><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;<B><I>Our oil and gas 
operations involve substantial costs and are subject to various economic 
risks.</I></B> Our oil and gas operations are subject to the economic risks 
typically associated with exploration, development and production activities, 
including the necessity of significant expenditures to locate and acquire 
producing properties and to drill exploratory wells. The cost and length of time
necessary to produce any reserves may be such that it will not be economically 
viable. In conducting exploration and development activities, the presence of 
unanticipated pressure or irregularities in formations, miscalculations or 
accidents may cause our exploration, development and production activities to be
unsuccessful. In addition, the cost and timing of drilling, completing and 
operating wells is often uncertain. We also face the risk that the oil and/or 
gas reserves may be less than anticipated, that we will not have sufficient 
funds to successfully drill on the property, that we will not be able to market 
the oil and/or gas due to a lack of a market and that fluctuations in the prices
of oil and/or gas will make development of those wells uneconomical. This could 
result in a total loss of our investments made in our 
operations.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA607><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA608><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>We conduct offshore 
exploration, exploitation and production operations off the coast of northwest 
Peru, all of which are also subject to a variety of operating risks peculiar to 
the marine environment.</I></B> Such risks include collisions, groundings and 
damage or loss from adverse weather conditions or interference from commercial 
or artesian fishing activities. These conditions can cause substantial damage to
facilities, tankers and vessels, as well as interrupt operations. As a result, 
we could incur substantial liabilities that could reduce or eliminate the funds 
available for exploration, exploitation and acquisitions or result in loss of 
equipment and properties.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA609><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA610><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Disruptions of services 
provided by marine service providers could temporarily impair our operations and
delay delivery of our oil to be sold.</I></B><B> </B>We depend on marine service
providers to support our offshore operations in the Block Z-1.&nbsp; These 
services include, among others, tender support barges for our drilling 
operations and tank vessels for oil storage and transportation.&nbsp; Any
disruptions or delay of the services provided by our marine service providers 
because of adverse weather or sea conditions, accidents, mechanical failures, 
insufficient personnel or other events could temporarily impair our operations, 
delay implementation of our business plan and increase our 
costs.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA611><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA612><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B>Risks Related to Our Geographic Location and 
Concentration</B></FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA613><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA614><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>The geographic concentration of
our properties in northwest Peru and southwest Ecuador subjects us to an 
increased risk of loss of revenue or curtailment of production from factors 
affecting that region specifically.</I></B> The geographic concentration of our 
properties in northwest Peru and southwest Ecuador and adjacent waters means 
that some or all of our properties could be affected by the same event should 
that region, for example, experience:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA615><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL616  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4028><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4020><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4021><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>natural 
disasters such as earthquakes and/or severe weather (such as the effects of 
&#8220;El Ni&#241;o,&#8221; which can <FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">cause 
excessive rainfall and flooding in Peru and 
Ecuador);&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL618  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4029><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4022><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4023><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>delays or 
decreases in production, the availability of equipment, facilities or 
services;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL619  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4030><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4024><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4025><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>delays or 
decreases in the availability of capacity to transport, gather or process 
production; or&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL620  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4031><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4026><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4027><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>changes in 
the political or regulatory 
environment.</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 54pt" id=PARA621><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA622><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Because all our properties could 
experience the same conditions at the same time, these conditions could have a 
relatively greater impact on our results of operations than they might have on 
other operators who have properties over a wider geographic 
area.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA623><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN:
0pt" id=PARA624><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Our operations in Peru and 
Ecuador involve substantial costs and are subject to certain risks because the 
oil and gas industry in Peru and Ecuador is less developed in comparison to the 
United States.</I></B> Because the oil and gas industry in Peru and Ecuador is 
less developed than in the United States, our drilling and development 
operations, in many instances, will take longer to complete and may cost more 
than similar operations in the United States. The availability of technical 
expertise and specific equipment and supplies may be more limited or costly in 
Peru and Ecuador than in the United States.&nbsp; If we are unable to obtain or 
unable to obtain without undue cost drilling rigs, equipment, supplies or 
personnel, our exploitation and exploration operations could be delayed or 
adversely affected, which could have a material adverse effect on our business, 
financial condition or results of operations.&nbsp; Furthermore, once oil and 
natural gas production is recovered, there are fewer ways to transport it to 
market for sale. Marine transportation for our offshore operations is subject to
risks such as adverse weather conditions, collisions, groundings and other risks
of damage or delay. Pipeline and trucking operations are subject to uncertainty 
and lack of availability. Oil and natural gas pipelines and truck transport 
travel through miles of territory and are subject to the risk of diversion, 
destruction or delay. We expect that such factors will continue to subject our 
international operations to economic and operating risks that companies with 
domestic operations do not experience.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA625><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></FONT></FONT>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK4127 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR4127 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM4127 >S-
18</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR4127 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA4127.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px"><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Along with the general instability that comes from
international operations, we face political and geographical risks specific to 
working in South America.</I></B> All of our oil and gas properties are located 
in South America, and specifically in Peru and Ecuador. The success and 
profitability of our international operations may be adversely affected by risks
associated with international activities, including:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA627><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL628  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4043><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4032><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4033><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif,
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>economic, 
labor, and social conditions;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL629  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4042><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4034><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4035><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>local and 
regional political instability;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL630  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4041><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4036><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4037><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>tax laws 
(including host-country export, excise and income taxes and U.S. taxes on 
foreign operations); and&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL631  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4040><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4038><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4039><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>fluctuations
in the value of the U.S. dollar versus the local currencies in which oil and gas
producing <FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">activities may be 
conducted.</FONT></FONT></P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 54pt" id=PARA633><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA634><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Legal uncertainty, operating expenses
and fluctuations in exchange rates may make our assumptions about the economic 
viability of our oil and gas properties incorrect. If these assumptions are 
incorrect, we may not be able to earn sufficient revenue to cover our costs of 
operations.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA635><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 38.9pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA636><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Social and political unrest in 
Peru and Peruvian election results could cause heightened scrutiny over oil and 
gas regulatory matters.</I></B> We believe there has been recent heightened 
scrutiny over regulatory matters concerning oil and gas exploration and 
production and the award of licensing contracts in Peru, in large part due to 
social and political change. In the last decade, Peru has experienced numerous 
occasions of social unrest, some violent at times, as a result of an increase in
extractive industry development.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA637><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA638><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Peru&#8217;s most recent municipal 
and regional political elections were held in November&nbsp;2010, and the next 
ones will be held in 2014.&nbsp; The Peruvian Presidential and Congressional 
election was held in April&nbsp;2011. Mr.&nbsp;Ollanta Humala narrowly won the 
run-off Presidential election and took office on July&nbsp;28, 2011 for a five-
year term.&nbsp; The electoral campaign brought heightened attention to various 
topics, including the regulation of oil and gas companies operating in Peru, and
related environmental law compliance.&nbsp; For example, Mr.&nbsp;Humala has 
called for increased environmental regulation, including additional regulation 
and oversight of the hydrocarbon and mining sectors, and regulation to combat 
global climate change and decrease the emission of greenhouse gases.&nbsp; In 
addition, during his campaign Mr.&nbsp;Humala proposed to raise royalties on oil
and gas production, which would help fund domestic social-regeneration 
projects.&nbsp; The Humala administration also recently negotiated with mining 
companies to raise royalties and taxes on the mining sector in Peru. While 
spokespersons for the new administration have stated the new administration 
intends to honor existing contracts, avoid nationalization and support continued
development of oil and gas activities, as a result of these elections, a shift 
in policy could occur with respect to the regulation of oil and gas companies 
making it more difficult or expensive for us to operate in such an 
environment.&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA639><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 38.9pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA640><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Similarly, in December 2011, 
President Humala replaced a significant part of his cabinet including the Prime 
Minister and the Minster of Energy &amp; Mines, after the prime minister and 
cabinet members resigned following President Humala&#8217;s declaration of a 
state of emergency in the region of Cajamarca following seemingly intractable 
protests over environmental issues affecting a major new mining development in 
the region. In July 2012, there were additional cabinet changes due to anti-
mining protests. The latest cabinet changes occurred on July 24, 2013. Such 
cabinet changes could result in unexpected shifts in the philosophy of 
governmental policies regarding the regulation of oil and gas companies and 
environmental policies.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA641><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA642><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>We are subject to numerous 
foreign laws and regulations of the oil and natural gas industry that can 
adversely affect the cost, manner or feasibility of doing business.</I></B> Our 
operations are subject to extensive foreign laws and regulations relating to the
exploration for oil and natural gas and the development, production and 
transportation of oil and natural gas, as well as electrical power 
generation.&nbsp; Because the oil and gas industry in the countries in which we 
operate is less developed than elsewhere, changes in laws and interpretations of
laws are more likely to occur than in countries with a more developed oil and 
gas industry.&nbsp; Future laws or regulations, as well as any adverse change in
the interpretation of existing laws or our failure to comply with existing legal
requirements may harm our results of operations and financial condition. In 
particular, there are indications that the administration in Ecuador may 
increase state intervention in the economy via new legislation and tightening 
control of areas such as energy, which could have a significant impact on our 
investment in that country or our ability to operate in the future in that 
country. We may be required to make our share of contributions to large and 
unanticipated expenditures to comply with governmental regulations, such 
as:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA643><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL644  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4082><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4044><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4045><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>work program
guarantees and other financial responsibility 
requirements;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL645  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4081><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4046><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4047><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT>taxation;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL646  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4080><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4048><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4049><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>royalty 
requirements;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL647  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>

19</DIV>

<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<P id=PARA4058><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4059><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

requirements.</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 54pt" id=PARA652><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA653><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Under these laws and regulations, we 
could be liable for our share of:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA654><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL655  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4074><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:

10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4060><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4061><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>personal 
injuries;&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL656  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4073><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4062><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4072><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:

10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4064><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:

10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4065><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

employee compensation and benefit 
costs;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL658  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4071><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4066><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4067><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>governmental
infringements and sanctions; 
and&nbsp;</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL659  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=4070><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4068><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;<FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA4069><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT>unitization 
payments.</P></FONT></FONT></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA660><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA661><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>If we fail to comply with the 
terms of certain contracts related to our foreign operations, we could lose our
rights under each of those contracts.</I></B> The terms of each of our Peruvian 
oil and gas license contracts, require that we perform certain activities, such 
as seismic acquisition, processing and interpretations and the drilling of 
required wells in accordance with those contracts and agreements. We are also 
required to conduct environmental impact studies and environmental impact 
assessments and establish our ability to comply with environmental 
regulations.&nbsp; Our failure to timely perform those activities as required 
could result in the suspension of our current production and sale of oil, the 
loss of our rights under a particular contract and/or the loss of the amounts we
have posted as a guaranty for the performance of such activities, which would 
result in a significant loss to us.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA662><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA663><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Compliance with, or breach of, 
laws relating to the discharge of materials into, and the protection of, the 
environment can be costly and could limit our operations.</I></B> As an owner or
lessee and operator of oil and gas properties in Peru and Ecuador, we are 
subject to various national, state and local laws and regulations relating to 
the discharge of materials into, and protection of, the environment. These laws 
and regulations may, among other things, (i)&nbsp;impose liability on the owner 
or lessee under an oil and gas lease for the cost of property damage, oil 
spills, discharge of hazardous materials, remediation and clean-up resulting 
from operations; (ii)&nbsp;subject the owner or lessee to liability for 
pollution damages and other environmental or natural resource damages; and 
(iii)&nbsp;require suspension or cessation of operations in affected areas. We 
have established practices for continued compliance with environmental laws and 
regulations and we believe the costs incurred by these policies and procedures 
so far have been necessary business costs in our industry. However, there is no 
assurance that changes in or additions to laws or regulations regarding the 
protection of the environment will not increase such compliance costs, or have a
material adverse effect upon our capital expenditures, earnings or competitive 
position.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA664><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA665><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>We are subject to environmental
regulatory and permitting laws and regulations that can adversely affect the 
cost, manner and feasibility of our planned operations.</I></B> The exploration 
for, and the development, production and sale of oil and gas in South America, 
and the construction and operation of power generation and gas processing 
facilities and pipelines in South America are subject to extensive 
environmental, health and safety laws and regulations. Our ability to conduct 
continued operations is subject to satisfying applicable regulatory and 
permitting controls. For example, we are required to obtain an environmental 
permit or approval from the government in Peru prior to conducting seismic 
operations, drilling a well or constructing a pipeline in Peruvian territory, 
including the waters offshore of Peru, where we intend to conduct future oil and
gas operations. We are also required to comply with numerous environmental 
regulations in order to transition from exploration into production in any new 
fields we develop. &nbsp;Additionally, environmental laws and regulations 
promulgated in Peru impose substantial restrictions on, among other things, the 
use of natural resources, interference with the natural environment, the 
location of facilities, the handling and storage of hazardous materials such as 
hydrocarbons, the use of radioactive material, the disposal of waste, and the 
emission of noise and other activities. The laws create additional monitoring 
and reporting obligations in the event of any spillage or unregulated discharge 
of hazardous materials such as hydrocarbons. Failure to comply with these laws 
and regulations also may result in the suspension or termination of our planned 
drilling operations and subject us to administrative, civil and criminal
penalties.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA666><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA667><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our current permits and 
authorizations and our ability to obtain future permits and authorizations may, 
over time, be susceptible to increased scrutiny, resulting in increased costs, 
or delays in receiving appropriate authorizations. In particular, we may 
experience delays in obtaining permits and authorizations in Peru necessary for 
our operations. </FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA668><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA669><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Compliance with these laws and 
regulations may increase our costs of operations, as well as further restrict 
our foreign operations. Moreover, these laws and regulations could change in 
ways that substantially increase our costs. These laws and regulations have 
changed in the past and have generally imposed more stringent requirements that 
increase operating costs or require capital expenditures in order to remain in 
compliance. It is also possible that unanticipated developments could cause us 
to make environmental expenditures that are significantly higher than those we 
currently anticipate, thereby increasing our overall costs. Any failure to 
comply with these laws and regulations could cause us to suspend or terminate 
certain operations or subject us to administrative, civil or criminal penalties.
Any of these liabilities, penalties, suspensions, terminations or regulatory 
changes could materially adversely affect our financial condition and our 
ability to implement our plan of operation.</FONT></FONT></P></FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA4129.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK4129 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR4129 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM4129 >S-
20</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR4129 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA670><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA671><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Competition for oil and natural
gas properties and prospects is intense; many of our competitors have larger 
financial, technical and personnel resources that give them an advantage in 
evaluating and obtaining properties and prospects.</I></B> We operate in a 
highly competitive environment for reviewing prospects, acquiring properties, 
marketing oil and natural gas and securing trained personnel and equipment. In 
addition, changes in Peruvian government regulation have enabled multinational 
and regional companies to enter the Peruvian energy market. We actively compete 
with other companies in our industry when acquiring new leases or oil and gas 
properties. Competition in our business activities has increased and will 
increase further, as existing and new participants expand their activities as a 
result of these regulatory changes. Many of our competitors possess and employ 
financial resources that allow them to obtain substantially greater technical 
and personnel resources than we have. For example, if several companies are 
interested in an area, Perupetro may choose to call for bids, either through 
international competitive biddings or through private bidding processes by 
invitation, and award the contract to the highest bidder. These additional 
resources can be particularly important in reviewing prospects and purchasing 
properties. Our competitors may be able to evaluate, bid for and purchase a
greater number of properties and prospects than our financial, technical or 
personnel resources permit. Our competitors may also be able to pay more for 
productive oil and natural gas properties and exploratory prospects than we are 
able or willing to pay. On the acquisition opportunities made available to us, 
we compete with other companies in our industry for properties operated by third
parties through a private bidding process, direct negotiations or some 
combination thereof. Our ability to acquire additional prospects and to find and
develop reserves in the future will depend on our ability to evaluate and select
suitable properties and to consummate transactions in a highly competitive 
environment. If we are unable to compete successfully in these areas in the 
future, our future revenues and growth may be diminished or restricted. The 
availability of properties for acquisition depends largely on the business 
practices of other oil and natural gas companies, commodity prices, general 
economic conditions and other factors we cannot control or 
influence.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA672><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA673><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Our management team has limited
experience in the power generation business.</I></B> Our plan of operation 
includes constructing power generation and pipelines in Peru.&nbsp; However, the
experience of our management team has primarily been in the oil and natural gas 
exploration and production industry and we have limited experience in the power 
generation business. We have hired a Director of Gas-to-Power.&nbsp; However, we
continue relying on consultants and outside engineering and technical firms to 
provide the expertise to plan and execute the power generation aspects of our 
strategy and we have not yet hired all necessary full-time employees to manage 
this line of business. No assurance can be given that we will be able to recruit
and hire qualified personnel on acceptable terms. Inability to hire such key 
technical personnel when necessary may adversely affect our gas-to-power 
project.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 40pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA674><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA675><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Construction and operation of 
power generation and pipelines involve significant risks and delays that cannot 
always be covered by insurance or contractual protections.</I></B> The 
construction of power generation and pipelines involve many risks, 
including:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA676><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>

cellPadding=0>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA692><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT></FONT>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt"><FONT size=+0><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The ongoing construction and future operation of 
these facilities involve all of the risks described above, in addition to risks 
relating to the breakdown or failure of equipment or processes and performances 
below expected levels of output or efficiency. We intend to maintain 
commercially reasonable levels of insurance, where such insurance is available 
and cost-effective, obtain warranties from vendors and obligate contractors to 
meet certain performance levels. However, the coverage or proceeds of any such 
insurance, warranties or performance guarantees may not be adequate to cover 
lost revenues or increased expenses. Any of these risks could cause us to 
operate below expected capacity levels, which in turn could result in lost 
revenues, increased expenses and higher costs.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK4130 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR4130 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM4130 >S-
21</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR4130 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 40pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA693><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA694><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;<B><I>The success of our gas-
to-power project will depend, in part, on the existence and growth of markets 
for natural gas and electricity in Peru.</I></B> Peru has a well-developed and 
stable market for electricity. Hydroelectric and gas-fired thermal power plants 
are the primary sources of electric generation, with each source providing 
approximately 50%. Hydroelectric plants are much less expensive to operate than 
plants that utilize natural gas, but they are subject to variable output based 
on rainfall and reservoir levels. Peru has natural gas reserves and production, 
but does not have a well-developed natural gas infrastructure, particularly in 
northwest Peru where we operate. Our immediate business plan relies on the 
continued stability of the power market in Peru. We currently do not expect to 
complete our power plant until 2015. Our assessment of the future power market 
and demand in Peru could be inaccurate. We are subject to the following risks 
that:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA695><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB697  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA698><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#9679;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA699><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">relatively 
more favorable business conditions for hydroelectric plants, a material 
reduction in power demand or other competitive issues may adversely affect the 
demand and prices for the electricity that we expect to produce by the time the 
power plant is completed;&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB701  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA702><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#9679;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA703><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">our lifting
costs could exceed the minimum wholesale power prices available, making the sale
of our gas uneconomical;&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB705  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA706><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA707><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">gas supply 
and reserves may not deliver as 
forecasted;&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB709  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA710><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#9679;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA711><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">potential 
disruptions or changes to the regulation of the natural gas or power markets in 
these countries could occur by the time our power plant is completed, or we may 
not receive the necessary environmental or other permits and governmental 
approvals necessary to operate our power 
plant;&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB713  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA714><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#9679;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA715><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">although we
plan to enter into long-term contracts to sell a significant part of our future 
power production, there can be no assurance that we will be successful in 
obtaining such contracts or that they will be on favorable terms; 
and&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB717  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA718><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#9679;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA719><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">we will be 
subject to the general commercial issues related to being in the power business,
including the credit-worthiness of, and collections from future customers and 
the ability to profitably operate our future power 
plant.</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA720><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B><I>&nbsp;</I></B></FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA721><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>We are subject to the Foreign 
Corrupt Practices Act (the &#8220;FCPA&#8221;), and our failure to comply with 
the laws and regulations thereunder could result in penalties which could harm 
our reputation and have a material adverse effect on our business, results of 
operations and financial condition.</I></B> &nbsp;We are subject to the FCPA, 
which generally prohibits companies and their intermediaries from making 
improper payments to foreign officials to secure any improper advantage for the 
purpose of obtaining or keeping business and/or other benefits. Since all of our
oil and gas properties are in Peru and Ecuador, there is a risk of potential 
FCPA violations. &nbsp;We have a FCPA policy and a compliance program designed 
to ensure that we, our employees and agents comply with the FCPA. &nbsp;There is
no assurance that such policy or program will work effectively all of the time
or protect us against liability under the FCPA for actions taken by our agents, 
employees and intermediaries with respect to our business or any businesses that
we acquire. &nbsp;Any violation of these laws could result in monetary penalties
against us or our subsidiaries and could damage our reputation and, therefore, 
our ability to do business.&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA722><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA723><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B>Other Business Risks</B></FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA724><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA725><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>We are subject to routine and 
ongoing tax audits with the United States Internal Revenue Service 
(&#8220;IRS&#8221;) and tax authorities for other jurisdictions that could 
result in additional tax assessment.</I></B> We have been subject to audits by 
the IRS and SUNAT, the tax and customs office in Peru. If the IRS or SUNAT 
disagrees with the positions taken by us on our tax returns, we could have 
additional tax liability, including interest and penalties. If our positions are
not upheld through the appeal process and we ultimately pay such amounts, the 
payment could have an adverse effect on our financial results and cash 
flows.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA726><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA727><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>Failure to generate taxable 
income and realize our deferred tax assets in Peru could have a material adverse
effect on our financial position and results of operations. </I></B>The 
assessment of deferred tax assets and of valuation allowances associated with 
deferred tax assets require management to make estimates and judgments about the
realization of deferred tax assets, which realization will be primarily based on
forecasts of future taxable income. Such estimates and judgments are inherently 
uncertain. We evaluate our deferred tax assets generated in Peru for realization
annually or whenever there is an indication that they are not realizable. The 
ultimate realization of our foreign deferred tax assets is dependent upon the 
generation of future taxable income in Peru within the time periods required by 
applicable tax statutes. Should we determine in the future that it is more 
likely than not that some portion or all of our foreign deferred tax assets will
not be realized, we will be required to record a valuation allowance in 
connection with these deferred tax assets. Such valuation allowance, if taken, 
would be recorded as a charge to income tax expense and our financial condition 
and operating results would be adversely affected in the period such 
determination is made.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA728><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA729><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><B><I>A cyber incident could result 
in information theft, data corruption, operational disruption, and/or financial 
loss.</I></B> Businesses have become increasingly dependent on digital 
technologies to conduct day-to-day operations. At the same time, cyber 
incidents, including deliberate attacks or unintentional events, have increased.
A cyber-attack could include gaining unauthorized access to digital systems for 
purposes of misappropriating assets or sensitive information, corrupting data, 
or causing operational disruption, or result in denial of service on 
websites.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN:
0pt">&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK4131 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR4131 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM4131 >S-
22</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR4131 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA4131.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA723>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA729><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT></FONT></P><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA6521></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA731><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The oil and gas industry has become 
increasingly dependent on digital technologies to conduct certain exploration, 
development and production activities. For example, software programs are used 
to interpret seismic data, manage drilling rigs, production equipment and 
gathering and transportation systems, conduct reservoir modeling and reserves 
estimation, and for compliance reporting. The use of mobile communication 
devices has also increased rapidly. The complexity of the technologies needed to
extract oil and gas in increasingly difficult physical environments, such as 
deepwater, and global competition for oil and gas resources make certain 
information more attractive to thieves.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA732><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA733><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We depend on digital technology, 
including information systems and related infrastructure, to process and record 
financial and operating data, communicate with our employees and business 
partners, analyze seismic and drilling information, estimate quantities of oil 
and gas reserves and for many other activities related to our business. Our 
business partners, including vendors, service providers, purchasers of our 
production and financial institutions, are also dependent on digital 
technology<B>.</B></FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA734><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA735><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our technologies, systems and 
networks, and those of our business partners may become the target of cyber-
attacks or information security breaches that could result in the unauthorized 
release, gathering, monitoring, misuse, loss or destruction of proprietary and 
other information, or other disruption of our business operations. In addition, 
certain cyber incidents, such as surveillance, may remain undetected for an 
extended period.</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA736><FONT 
id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA737><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A cyber incident involving our 
information systems and related infrastructure, or that of our business 
partners, could disrupt our business plans and negatively impact our operations 
in the following ways, among others:</FONT></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -35pt; MARGIN: 0pt
0pt 0pt 70pt" id=PARA738><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB740  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA741><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&#9679;</FONT></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA742><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">unauthorized access to seismic data, reserves information or other 
sensitive or proprietary information could have a negative impact on our 
competitive position in developing our oil and gas 
resources;</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB744  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM:

FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">data 
corruption, communication interruption, or other operational disruption during 
drilling activities could result in a dry hole cost or even drilling incidents; 
</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB748  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM:

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA750><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">data 
corruption or operational disruption of production infrastructure could result 
in loss of production or accidental discharge; 
</FONT></FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB752  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 37pt"><FONT id=clearSpaces>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA753><FONT id=clearSpaces><FONT style="FONT-
