10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4690><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">upon the issuance 
of any shares of our common stock pursuant to any option, warrant, right or 
exercisable, exchangeable or convertible security not described in the preceding
bullet and outstanding as of the date the notes were first 
issued;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4691>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4693  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4694><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4695><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">upon the repurchase
of any shares of our common stock pursuant to an open-market share repurchase 
program or other buy-back transaction that is not a tender offer or exchange 
offer of the nature described in clause (5) 
above;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4696>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4698  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4699><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4700><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">for a change in the
par value of the common stock; or</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4701>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4703  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4704><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4705><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">for accrued and 
unpaid interest.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4706>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4707><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">No adjustment to the conversion rate will be required 
unless the adjustment would require an increase or decrease of at least 1% of 
the conversion rate. If the adjustment is not made because the adjustment does 
not change the conversion rate by at least 1%, then the adjustment that is not 
made will be carried forward and taken into account in any future adjustment. 
Any adjustment that is deferred as a result of this provision will be made on 
December 31 of the year in which the adjustment would have been made, but for 
this provision. All required calculations will be made to the nearest cent or 
1/1</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">,000th of a share, as the case may be. Notwithstanding the 
foregoing we will make such carried forward adjustments, regardless of whether 
the aggregate adjustment is less than 1%, on the conversion date for any 
notes</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4708>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4709><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If a conversion rate adjustment becomes effective on any
ex-dividend date as described above</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, and a holder that has 
converted its notes on or after such ex</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">-dividend date and on or 
prior to the related record date would be treated as the record holder of our 
common stock as of the related conversion date as described under 
&#8220;&#8212;Conversion procedures&#8221; above based on an adjusted conversion
rate for such ex</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">-dividend date, then, notwithstanding the 
conversion rate adjustment provisions above, the conversion rate adjustment 
relating to such ex</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">-dividend date will not be made for such 
converting holder. Instead</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, such holder will be treated as if 
such holder were the record owner of shares of our common stock on an unadjusted
basis on such conversion date and participate in the related 
dividend</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, distribution or other event giving rise to such
adjustment.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4710>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4711><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Voluntary </FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">increases</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"> of conversion 
rate</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4712>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4713><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In addition to the foregoing adjustments, we may, from 
time to time, increase the conversion rate by any amount for a period of at 
least&nbsp;20 business days or any longer period as may be permitted or required
by law, if our board of directors makes a determination, which determination 
shall be conclusive, that such increase would be in our best interests. Such 
Conversion Rate increase shall be irrevocable during such period. In such a 
case, we would give notice to the Trustee and cause notice to be sent to each 
holder of notes at least 15 days prior to the date on which such increase 
commences.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4714>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4715><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Tax effect</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4716>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4717><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A holder may</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, in some circumstances, 
including the distribution of cash dividends to holders of our shares of common 
stock, be deemed to have received a distribution or dividend subject to United 
States federal income tax as a result of an adjustment or the nonoccurrence of 
an adjustment to the conversion rate, and such adjustment or nonoccurrence of an
adjustment may result in withholding taxes for holders (including backup 
withholding taxes or withholding taxes on payments to foreign persons). Because 
this deemed income would not give rise to any cash from which any applicable 
withholding tax could be satisfied</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, if we pay withholding 
taxes on behalf of a holder, we may, at our option, set-off such payments 
against payments of cash and common stock on the notes. See &#8220;Material 
United States Federal Income Tax Considerations&#8212;U.S. 
holders&#8212;Constructive distributions&#8221; and &#8220;Material United 
States Federal Income Tax Considerations&#8212;Non</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">-
U.S</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. holders&#8212;Dividends and constructive 
dividends.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4718>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4719><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Recapitalizations, reclassifications and changes of our common 
stock</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4720>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4721><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In the case of any recapitalization, reclassification or
change of our common stock (other than changes resulting from a subdivision or 
combination), a consolidation</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, merger or combination involving us,
a sale or conveyance to another person of all or substantially all of our 
property and assets or any statutory share exchange, in each case as a result of
which our common stock would be converted into</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, or exchanged for,
stock, other securities, other property or assets (including cash or any 
combination thereof), then, following the effective time of the transaction, the
right to receive shares of our common stock upon conversion of a note, if any, 
will be changed into the right to receive the kind and amount of shares of 
stock, other securities or other property or assets (including cash or any 
combination thereof) that a holder would have been entitled to receive (the 
&#8220;reference property&#8221;) upon such transaction in respect of such 
common stock.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4722>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5751.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5751 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5751 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5751 >S-
45</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5751 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5751.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4723><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">From and after the effective time of such 
transaction:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4724>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4726  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4727><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4728><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the conversion rate
will relate to units of such reference property (a &#8220;unit&#8221; of 
reference property being the kind and amount of reference property that a holder
of one share of our common stock would receive in such transaction); 
and</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4729>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4731  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4732><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM:
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4733><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the applicable 
stock price will be determined based on last reported sale prices of one unit of
reference property.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4734>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4735><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If the transaction causes our common stock to be 
converted into the right to receive more than a single type of consideration 
(determined based in part upon any form of stockholder election), the reference 
property will be deemed to be the weighted average of the types and amounts of 
consideration received by the holders of our common stock that affirmatively 
make such an election. We will notify holders of the weighted average as soon as
practicable after such determination is made. We will agree in the indenture not
to become a party to any such transaction unless its terms are consistent with 
the foregoing.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4736>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4737><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Adjustment to shares delivered upon conversion upon make-whole fundamental
change</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4738>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4739><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If a fundamental change described in clause (2) (without
giving effect to the proviso in such clause) of the definition thereof (a 
&#8220;make-whole fundamental change&#8221;) occurs prior to the maturity date 
and a holder elects to convert its notes in connection with such make-whole 
fundamental change, we will, under certain circumstances, increase the 
conversion rate by a number of additional shares of common stock (the 
&#8220;additional shares&#8221;) as described below. Any conversion will be 
deemed for these purposes to be &#8220;in connection with&#8221; such make-whole
fundamental change only if such notes are surrendered for conversion on or 
following the effective date of the make-whole fundamental change up 
to</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; 
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, and including</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, the business day 
immediately prior to the related fundamental change purchase date, and 
notwithstanding the fact that a note may then be convertible because another 
condition to conversion also has been satisfied. We will notify holders of the 
notes and the trustee of the anticipated effective date of such make-whole 
fundamental change at least 15 scheduled trading days prior to the anticipated 
effective date of such transaction and issue a press release announcing such 
effective date no later than five business days after such effective 
date.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4740>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4741><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The number of additional shares by which the conversion 
rate will be increased will be determined by reference to the table below, based
on the date on which the fundamental change occurs or becomes effective (the 
&#8220;effective date&#8221;) and the price (the &#8220;stock price&#8221;) paid
per share of our common stock in the make-whole fundamental change. If holders 
of our common stock receive only cash in the make-whole fundamental change, the 
stock price shall be the cash amount paid per share. Otherwise</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">, the stock price shall be the average of the last reported sale prices of
our common stock over the five trading-day period ending on the trading day 
preceding the effective date of the make-whole fundamental change.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4742>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4743><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The stock prices set forth in the first row of the table
below (i.e., column headers) will be adjusted as of any date on which the 
conversion rate of the notes is otherwise adjusted</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. The 
adjusted stock prices will equal the stock prices applicable immediately prior 
to such adjustment, multiplied by a fraction</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, the numerator of 
which is the conversion rate immediately prior to the adjustment giving rise to 
the stock price adjustment and the denominator of which is the conversion rate 
as so adjusted. The number of additional shares will be adjusted in the same 
manner as the conversion rate as set forth under &#8220;&#8212;Conversion rate 
adjustments.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4744>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK4745 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR4745 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM4745 >S-
46</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR4745 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA2719>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4752><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The following table sets forth the hypothetical stock 
price and the number of additional shares to be received per $1</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">,000 principal amount of notes: <BR><BR></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px">

10pt">0.0000</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA432><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 5%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom">

style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">0.0000</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 1%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom">

style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:

<TD style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 5%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom">

<TD style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 5%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom">

<TD style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 5%; VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom">

10pt">0.0000</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px"></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA177><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4764><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The exact stock prices and effective dates may not be 
set forth in the table above, in which case</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4765>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4767  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4768><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4769><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If the stock price 
is between two stock price amounts in the table or the effective date is between
two effective dates in the table, the number of additional shares will be 
determined by a straight-line interpolation between the number of additional 
shares set forth for the higher and lower stock price amounts and the two dates,
as applicable, based on a 365-day year.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4770>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4772  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4773><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4774><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If the stock price 
is greater than $12.00 per share (subject to adjustment), no additional shares 
will be added to the conversion rate.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4775>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4777  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4778><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4779><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If the stock price 
is less than $2.29 per share (subject to adjustment), no additional shares will 
be added to the conversion rate.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4780>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4781><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Notwithstanding the foregoing, the conversion rate shall
not exceed&nbsp;436.7346 per $1,000 principal amount of notes on account of 
adjustments described in this section</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, subject to the 
adjustments set forth in clauses (1) through (5) of &#8220;&#8212;Conversion 
rate adjustments.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4782>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4783><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our obligation to increase the conversion rate as 
described above could be considered a penalty</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, in which case the
enforceability thereof would be subject to general principles of economic 
remedies.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4784>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4785><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">An increase in the conversion rate upon a fundamental 
change may be treated as a deemed distribution to holders of the notes, possibly
subject to United States federal withholding tax. See &#8220;Material United 
States Federal Income Tax Considerations.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4786>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4787><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">As described above under
&#8220;&#8212;Recapitalizations, reclassifications, and changes of our common 
stock,&#8221; upon effectiveness of any make-whole fundamental change and a 
related conversion, the conversion rate with respect to the notes submitted for 
conversion will be determined based upon the reference property, which will 
likely consist of cash, securities or other property not listed on a national 
securities exchange.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4788>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4789><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Fundamental change permits holders to require us to purchase 
notes</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4790>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4791><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If a fundamental change (as defined below in this 
section) occurs at any time,&nbsp;holders will have the right, at their 
option</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, to require us to purchase any or all of&nbsp;their 
notes, or any portion of the principal amount thereof, at a purchase price equal
to 1</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">00% of the principal amount of the notes to be purchased plus 
accrued and unpaid interest to but excluding the fundamental change purchase 
date (unless the fundamental change purchase date is between a regular record 
date and the interest payment date to which it relates, in which case we will 
pay accrued and unpaid interest to the holder of record on such regular record 
date). The fundamental change purchase date will be a date specified by us no 
later than the 35th day following the date of our fundamental change notice as 
described below. Any notes purchased by us will be paid for in cash</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4792>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5869.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5869 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5869 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5869 >S-
47</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5869 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5869.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4793><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A &#8220;fundamental change&#8221; will be deemed to 
have occurred if any of the following occurs:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4794>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4796  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4797><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4798><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">a &#8220;person&#8221; or 
&#8220;group&#8221; within the meaning of Section 13(d) of the Exchange Act 
other than us, our subsidiaries or our or their employee benefit plans, files a
Schedule TO or any schedule, form or report under the Exchange Act disclosing 
that such person or group has become the &#8220;beneficial owner,&#8221; as 
defined in Rule 13d-3 under the Exchange Act, of our common equity representing 
more than 50% of the ordinary voting power of our common 
equity;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4799>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4801  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4802><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4803><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">consummation of any share 
exchange, consolidation or merger of us pursuant to which our common stock will 
be converted into cash, securities or other property or any sale, lease or other
transfer in one transaction or a series of transactions of all or substantially 
all of our and our subsidiaries&#8217; assets, taken as a whole, to any person 
other than one of our subsidiaries; provided, however, that a transaction where 
the holders of more than 50% of all classes of our common equity immediately 
prior to such transaction own, directly or indirectly, more than 50% of all 
classes of common equity of the continuing or surviving entity or transferee or 
the parent thereof immediately after such event shall not be a fundamental 
change; or</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4804>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4806  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4807><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4808><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">our common stock (or other
common stock into which the notes are then convertible) ceases to be listed on a
U.S. national or regional securities exchange or quoted on an established 
automated over- the-counter trading market in the United States for a period of 
30 consecutive scheduled trading days.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4809>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4810><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A fundamental change described in clause (2) of the 
definition will not be deemed to have occurred, however, if at least 90% of the 
consideration received or to be received by our common stockholders, excluding 
cash payments for fractional shares and cash payments in respect of statutory 
dissenters&#8217; rights, in connection with the transaction or transactions 
constituting the fundamental change described in clause (2) of the definition 
consists of shares of common stock (or depositary receipts or shares evidencing 
common stock) traded on a U.S. national or regional securities 
exchange</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, or which will be so traded when issued or exchanged in
connection with a fundamental change described in clause (2) of the definition 
(these securities being referred to as &#8220;publicly traded securities&#8221;)
and as a result of this transaction or transactions the notes become convertible
into such consideration.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4811>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4812><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On or before the 2</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">0th day after the 
occurrence of a fundamental change, we will provide to all holders of the notes 
and the trustee and paying agent a notice (delivered in any manner permitted by 
the indenture, including through DTC) of the occurrence of the fundamental 
change and of the resulting purchase right. Such notice shall state, among other
things:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4813>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4815  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4816><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4817><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the events causing 
a fundamental change;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4818>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4820  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4821><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4822><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the date of the 
fundamental change;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4823>&nbsp;</P>

and</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4853>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>

<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>

10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4857><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the procedures that
holders must follow to require us to purchase their notes. </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT>&nbsp;</P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4858>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt">Simultaneously
with providing such notice, we will publish a notice containing this information
in a newspaper of general circulation in New York City&nbsp;or publish the 
information on our website or through such other public medium as we may use at 
that time</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5870.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5870 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5870 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5870 >S-
48</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5870 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5870.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4859><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">To exercise the purchase right</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">,&nbsp;a 
holder&nbsp;must deliver</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, on or before the business day 
immediately preceding the fundamental change purchase date, subject to extension
to comply with applicable law, the notes to be purchased, duly endorsed for 
transfer, together with a written purchase notice and the form entitled 
&#8220;Form of Fundamental Change Purchase Notice&#8221; on the reverse side of 
the notes duly completed, to the paying agent.&nbsp;The&nbsp;purchase notice 
must state:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4860>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4862  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4863><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4864><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">if certificated, 
the certificate numbers of&nbsp;the notes to be delivered for purchase, or if
not certificated,&nbsp;the notice must comply with appropriate DTC 
procedures;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4865>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>

sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4867  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM:

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the portion of the

<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4870>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>

<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4874><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">that the notes are 
to be purchased by us pursuant to the applicable provisions of the notes and the
indenture.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4875>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4876><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A holder&nbsp;may withdraw any purchase notice in whole 
or in part by a written notice of withdrawal delivered to the paying agent prior
to the close of business on the business day prior to the fundamental change 
purchase date. The notice of withdrawal must state:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4877>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4879  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4880><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4881><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the principal 
amount of the withdrawn notes; </FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4882>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4884  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4885><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
