<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4886><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">if certificated 
notes have been issued, the certificate numbers of the withdrawn notes, or if 
not certificated,&nbsp;the notice must comply with appropriate DTC procedures; 
and</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4887>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4889  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4890><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4891><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the principal 
amount, if any, which remains subject to the purchase 
notice.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4892>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4893><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We will be required to purchase the notes on the 
fundamental change purchase date, subject to extension to comply with applicable
law. The holder will receive payment of the fundamental change purchase price 
promptly following the later of the fundamental change purchase date or the time
of book</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">-entry transfer or the delivery of the notes. If the 
paying agent holds money or securities sufficient to pay the fundamental change 
purchase price of the notes on the business day following the fundamental change
purchase date, then:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4894>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4896  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4897><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4898><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the notes will 
cease to be outstanding and interest will cease to accrue (whether or not book-
entry transfer of the notes is made or whether or not the note is delivered to 
the paying agent); and</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4899>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4901  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 54pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4902><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PARA4903><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"></FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">all other rights of
the holder will terminate (other than the right to receive the fundamental 
change purchase price and previously accrued and unpaid interest upon delivery 
or transfer of the notes).</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4904>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4905><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The purchase rights of the holders could discourage a 
potential acquirer of us. The fundamental change purchase feature, however, is 
not the result of management&#8217;s knowledge of any specific effort to obtain 
control of us by any means or part of a plan by management to adopt a series of 
anti-takeover provisions.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4906>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4907><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The term fundamental change is limited to specified 
transactions and may not include other events that might adversely affect our 
financial condition</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. In addition</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, the 
requirement that we offer to purchase the notes upon a fundamental change may 
not protect holders in the event of a highly leveraged transaction, 
reorganization</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, merger or similar transaction involving us that
is not a fundamental change (as defined).</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4908>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4909><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">No notes may be purchased at the option of holders upon 
a fundamental change if there has occurred and is continuing an event of default
other than an event of default that is cured by the payment of the fundamental 
change purchase price of the notes.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4910>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4911><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We will be responsible for making all determinations 
with respect to the adequacy of all notices electing to require us to purchase 
notes and all notices withdrawing such elections and any such determination 
shall be binding on the applicable holder.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4912>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4913><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The definition of fundamental change includes a phrase 
relating to the sale, lease or other transfer of &#8220;all or substantially 
all&#8221; of our and our subsidiaries&#8217; assets. There is no precise, 
established definition of the phrase &#8220;substantially all&#8221; under 
applicable law. Accordingly, the ability of a holder of the notes to require us 
to purchase its notes as a result of the sale, lease or other transfer of less 
than all of our and our subsidiaries&#8217; assets may be uncertain</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4914>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4915><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If a fundamental change were to occur, we may not have 
enough funds to pay the fundamental change purchase price. See &#8220;Risk 
Factors&#8221; under the caption &#8220;We may not have the ability to raise the
funds to pay interest on the notes, to purchase the notes upon a fundamental 
change or to pay cash due upon conversion or repurchase of the notes.&#8221; If 
we fail to purchase the notes when required following a fundamental change, we 
will be in default under the indenture. In addition</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, we have, 
and may in the future incur, other indebtedness with similar change in control 
provisions permitting our holders to accelerate or to require us to purchase our
indebtedness upon the occurrence of similar events or on some specific 
dates.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4916>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5871.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5871 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5871 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5871 >S-
49</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5871 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5871.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4917><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Consolidation, merger and sale of assets</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4918>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4919><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The indenture provides that we shall not consolidate 
with or merge with or into</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, or convey, transfer or lease all or
substantially all of our properties and assets to, another person</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">, unless (i) the resulting, surviving or transferee entity (if not the 
company) is a corporation</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, partnership</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">, trust or limited liability company organized under the laws of the 
United States of America, any state thereof or the District of Columbia, and 
such transferee entity expressly assumes by supplemental indenture all the 
obligations of the company under the notes and the indenture; and (ii) 
immediately after giving effect to such transaction</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, no 
default has occurred and is continuing under the indenture</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">. Upon any such consolidation</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, merger or transfer, the 
resulting, surviving or transferee entity shall succeed to, and may exercise 
every right and power of, the company under the indenture</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4920>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4921><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Although these types of transactions are permitted under
the indenture, certain of the foregoing transactions could constitute a 
fundamental change (as defined above) permitting each holder to require us to 
purchase the notes of such holder as described above.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4922>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4923><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Future guarantees</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4924>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4925><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The indenture provides that if we issue any unsecured 
debt securities, and any of our subsidiaries provides a guarantee with respect 
to such debt securities, then we will, within 30 days following the issuance of 
any such guarantee, cause each such subsidiary to execute a supplement to the 
indenture under which such subsidiary will guarantee our obligations under the 
notes on terms substantially similar (in our good faith determination) to the 
guarantee provided with respect to the debt securities. The guarantee of any 
such subsidiary may be released if the subsidiary no longer guarantees such debt
securities, if such subsidiary is dissolved or liquidated, if such subsidiary is
no longer our subsidiary or upon satisfaction and discharge of the 
notes.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4926>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA4927><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Events of default</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4928>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4929><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Each of the following is an event of default:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4930>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4932  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4933><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial,
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4934><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">default in any payment of 
interest on any note when due and payable where such default continues for a 
period of 30 days;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4935>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4937  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4938><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4939><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">default in the payment of 
principal of any note when due and payable at its stated maturity, upon required
repurchase, upon declaration of acceleration or otherwise and such default 
continues for a period of 10 days;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4940>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4942  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4943><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4944><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">failure by the company to 
comply with its obligation to convert the notes in accordance with the indenture
upon exercise of a holder&#8217;s conversion right and such failure continues 
for a period of 10 days;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4945>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4947  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4948><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4949><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">failure by the company to 
give a fundamental change notice or notice of a specified corporate transaction 
as described under &#8220;&#8212;Conversion upon specified corporate 
transactions,&#8221; in each case when due;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4950>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4952  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4953><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4954><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">failure by the company to 
comply with its obligations under &#8220;&#8212;Consolidation, merger and sale 
of assets;&#8221;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4955>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4957  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4958><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(6)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4959><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">failure by the company for
90 days after written notice from the trustee or the holders of at least 25% in 
principal amount of the notes then outstanding has been received to comply with 
any of its other agreements contained in the notes or 
indenture;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4960>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4962  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4963><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(7)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4964><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">default by the company or 
any subsidiary in the payment of the principal or interest on any mortgage, 
agreement or other instrument under which there shall be outstanding, or by 
which there shall be secured or evidenced any indebtedness for money borrowed in
excess of $25 million in the aggregate of the company and/or any subsidiary, 
whether such indebtedness now exists or shall hereafter be created, resulting in
such indebtedness becoming or being declared due and payable, and such 
acceleration shall not have been rescinded or annulled within 30 days after 
written notice of such acceleration has been received by the company or such 
subsidiary from the trustee (or to us and the trustee from the holders of at 
least 25% in principal amount of the outstanding notes);
or</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4965>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4967  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4968><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(8)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4969><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">certain events of 
bankruptcy, insolvency, or reorganization of the company or any significant 
subsidiary (as defined in Regulation S-X under the Exchange Act) (the 
&#8220;bankruptcy provisions&#8221;).</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4970>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4971><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If an event of default occurs and is continuing, the 
trustee by notice to us, or the holders of at least 25% in principal amount of 
the outstanding notes by notice to us and the trustee, may</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">, and the trustee at the request of such holders shall, declare 100% of 
the principal of all the notes&nbsp;and accrued and unpaid interest thereon, 
including additional interest or premium</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, if any</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">, to be due and payable. In case of certain events of bankruptcy, 
insolvency on reorganization</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"> involving us or a significant 
subsidiary, 1</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">00% of the principal, premium</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">, if any, and accrued and unpaid interest on the notes will automatically 
become due and payable. Upon such a declaration, such principal, premium (if 
any) and accrued and unpaid interest, including any additional interest will be 
due and payable immediately.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4972>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5872.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5872 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5872 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5872 >S-
50</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5872 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5872.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4973><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Notwithstanding the foregoing, the indenture will 
provide that the sole remedy for an event of default relating to the failure to 
comply with the reporting obligations in the indenture</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, which are
described below under the caption &#8220;&#8212;Reports</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">,&#8221; 
and for any failure to comply with the requirements of Section 314(a)(1) of the 
Trust Indenture Act, will, for the 365 days after the occurrence of such an 
event of default, consist exclusively of the right to receive additional
interest on the notes at an annual rate equal to 0.25% of the principal amount 
of the notes. The additional interest will accrue on all outstanding notes from 
and including the date on which an event of default relating to a failure to 
comply with the reporting obligations in the indenture first occurs to but not 
including the 365th day thereafter (or such earlier date on which the event of 
default relating to the reporting obligations shall have been cured or 
waived)</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. On such 365th day (or earlier, if the event of default
relating to the reporting obligations is cured or waived prior to such 365th 
day), such additional interest will cease to accrue and the notes will be 
subject to acceleration as provided above if the event of default is 
continuing</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4974>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4975><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The holders of a majority in principal amount of the 
outstanding notes may waive all past defaults (except with respect to nonpayment
of principal or interest or failure to deliver, upon conversion, cash and shares
of our common stock, if applicable) and rescind any such acceleration with 
respect to the notes and its consequences if (1) rescission would not conflict 
with any judgment or decree of a court of competent jurisdiction and (2) all 
existing events of default, other than the nonpayment of the principal of and 
interest on the notes that have become due solely by such declaration of 
acceleration, have been cured or waived</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4976>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA4977><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject to the provisions of the indenture relating to 
the duties of the trustee, if an event of default occurs and is continuing, the 
trustee will be under no obligation to exercise any of the rights or powers 
under the indenture at the request or direction of any of the holders unless 
such holders have offered to the trustee indemnity or security reasonably 
satisfactory to it against any loss, liability or expense. Except to enforce the
right to receive payment of principal or interest when due, no holder may pursue
any remedy with respect to the indenture or the notes unless:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4978>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4980  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4981><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4982><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">such holder has previously
given the trustee notice that an event of default is 
continuing;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4983>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4985  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4986><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4987><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">holders of at least 25% in
principal amount of the outstanding notes have requested the trustee to pursue 
the remedy;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4988>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4990  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4991><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4992><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">such holders have offered 
the trustee security or indemnity reasonably satisfactory to it against any 
loss, liability or expense;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4993>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB4995  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4996><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA4997><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the trustee has not 
complied with such request within 60 days after the receipt of the request and 
the offer of security or indemnity; and</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA4998>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5000  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5001><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5002><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the holders of a majority 
in principal amount of the outstanding notes have not given the trustee a 
direction that, in the opinion of the trustee, is inconsistent with such request
within such 60-day period.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5003>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5004><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject to certain restrictions, the holders of a 
majority in principal amount of the outstanding notes are given the right to 
direct the time, method and place of conducting any proceeding for any remedy 
available to the trustee or of exercising any trust or power conferred on the 
trustee. The indenture provides that in the event an event of default has 
occurred and is continuing, the trustee will be required in the exercise of its 
powers to use the degree of care that a prudent person would use in the conduct 
of its own affairs</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif,
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. The trustee, however, may refuse to follow any 
direction that conflicts with law or the indenture or that the trustee 
determines is unduly prejudicial to the rights of any other holder or that would
involve the trustee in personal liability. Prior to taking any action under the 
indenture, the trustee will be entitled to indemnification satisfactory to it in
its sole discretion against all losses and expenses caused by taking or not 
taking such action.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5005>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5006><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The indenture provides that if a default occurs and is 
continuing and is known to the trustee, the trustee must provide to each holder 
notice of the default within 9</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">0 days after it occurs. Except in the
case of a default in the payment of principal of or interest on any note, the 
trustee may withhold notice if and so long as the trustee determines in good 
faith that withholding notice is in the interests of the holders. In addition, 
we are required to deliver to the trustee, within 120 days after the end of each
fiscal year, a certificate indicating whether the signers thereof know of any 
default that occurred during the previous year. We are also required to deliver 
to the trustee, within 3</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">0 days after the occurrence thereof, 
written notice of any events which would constitute certain defaults, their 
status and what action we are taking or propose to take in respect 
thereof.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5007>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5873.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5873 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5873 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5873 >S-
51</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5873 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5873.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5008><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Modification and amendment</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5009>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5010><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject to certain exceptions, the indenture or the 
notes may be amended with the consent of the holders of at least a majority in 
principal amount of the notes then outstanding (including without limitation, 
consents obtained in connection with a purchase of</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, or tender
offer or exchange offer for, notes) and, subject to certain exceptions, any past
default or compliance with any provisions may be waived with the consent of the 
holders of a majority in principal amount of the notes then outstanding 
(including</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, without limitation, consents obtained in connection
with a purchase of</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif,
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, or tender offer or exchange offer for, notes). 
However, without the consent of each holder of an outstanding note affected, no 
amendment may</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, among other things:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5011>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5013  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5014><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5015><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">reduce the percentage in 
aggregate principal amount of notes whose holders must consent to an amendment 
or waive any past default;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5016>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5018  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5019><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5020><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">reduce the rate of or 
extend the stated time for payment of interest on any note; 
</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5021>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5023  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5024><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5025><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">reduce the principal of or
extend the stated maturity of any note;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5026>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5028  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5029><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5030><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">otherwise impair the right
of any holder to receive payment of principal, premium, if any, and interest on 
such holder&#8217;s notes on or after the due dates therefor or to institute 
suit for the enforcement of any payment on or with respect to such 
holder&#8217;s notes;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5031>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5033  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5034><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5035><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">make any change that 
impairs or adversely affects the conversion rights of any 
notes;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5036>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5038  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5039><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(6)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5040><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">reduce the purchase price 
or fundamental change purchase price of any note or amend or modify in any 
manner adverse to the holders of notes our obligation to make such 
payments;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5041>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5043  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5045><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">make any note payable in 
currency other than that stated in the note; or</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>

cellPadding=0>

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5050><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">make any change in the 
amendment provisions which require each holder&#8217;s consent or in the waiver 
provisions.</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5051>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5052><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Without the consent of any holder, we and the trustee 
may amend the indenture to:</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5053>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5055  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5057><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">cure any ambiguity, 
omission, defect or inconsistency in the indenture in a manner that does not 
individually or in the aggregate adversely affect the rights of any holder of 
notes in any material respect;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5058>&nbsp;</P>

<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5088>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>

<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5093>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>

cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM:

Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">add to events of default 
for the benefit of the holders of the notes; or</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5098>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=MTAB5100  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 36pt">&nbsp;</TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5101><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(10)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 
0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 5.05pt" id=PARA5102><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">conform the text of the 
indenture or the notes to any provision of this &#8220;Description of 
Notes.&#8221;</FONT></P></TD></TR></TABLE></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5103>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5104><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The consent of the holders is not necessary under the 
indenture to approve the particular form of any proposed amendment. It is 
sufficient if such consent approves the substance of the proposed amendment. 
After an amendment under the indenture becomes effective we are required to send
to the holders a notice briefly describing such amendment. However, the failure 
to give such notice to all the holders, or any defect in the notice, will not 
impair or affect the validity of the amendment</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5105>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5874.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5874 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5874 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5874 >S-
52</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5874 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5874.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5106><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Discharge</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5107>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5108><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may satisfy and discharge our obligations under the 
indenture by delivering to the registrar for cancellation all outstanding notes 
or by depositing with the trustee or delivering to the holders, as applicable, 
after the notes have become due and payable</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, whether at stated
maturity</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, on any purchase date, or upon conversion or otherwise,
cash or shares of common stock (in respect of conversions) sufficient to pay all
of the outstanding notes and paying all other sums payable under the indenture 
by us</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. Such discharge is subject to terms contained in the 
indenture.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5109>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5110><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">No stockholder rights for holders of notes</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5111>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA5112><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Holders of notes, as such</FONT><FONT style="FONT-
FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, will not 
have any rights as our stockholders (including, without limitation, voting 
rights and rights to receive any dividends or other distributions on our common 
stock).</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5113>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5114><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Reports</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5115>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5116><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We must deliver to the trustee, within 15 days after it 
is required to be filed with the SEC, copies of the information, documents and 
other reports which we are required to file with the SEC pursuant to Section 13 
or 15(d) of the Exchange Act. This covenant shall be deemed satisfied if we file
any such required information</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, documents or other reports with the
SEC&#8217;s electronic filing system</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5117>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5118><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Notices</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5119>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5120><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Except as otherwise provided in the indenture, notices 
to holders of the notes will be given by mail to the addresses of holders of the
notes as they appear in the notes register, or in the case of notes in global 
form, in accordance with the applicable procedures of DTC.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5121>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5122><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">No personal liability of directors, officers, employees and 
stockholders</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5123>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5124><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">No director</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, officer, employee, 
incorporator, stockholder or partner of us, as such, will have any liability for
any of our obligations under the notes or the indenture for any claim based on, 
in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their creation. Each holder 
of notes, by accepting a note, waives and releases all such liability. The 
waiver and release are part of the consideration for issuance of the 
notes.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5125>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5126><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Calculations in respect of notes</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: 
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5127>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5128><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Except as otherwise provided above</FONT><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">, we will be responsible for making all calculations called for under the 
notes. These calculations include, but are not limited to, determinations of the
last reported sale prices of our common stock</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, accrued interest 
payable on the notes, and the conversion rate of the notes and any adjustments 
thereto</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">. We will make all these calculations in good faith and,
absent manifest error, our calculations will be final and binding on holders of 
notes. We will provide a schedule of our calculations to each of the trustee and
the conversion agent, and each of the trustee and conversion agent is entitled 
to rely conclusively upon the accuracy of our calculations without independent 
verification. The trustee will forward our calculations to any holder of notes 
upon the request of that holder.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5129>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5130><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Trustee</B></FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5131>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA5132><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Wells Fargo Bank</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, 
Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, National 
Association</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, is the initial trustee, registrar, paying agent and 
conversion agent for the notes. In each of its capacities, including without 
limitation as trustee</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">, security registrar, paying agent and 
conversion agent, it assumes no responsibility for the accuracy or completeness 
of the information concerning us or our affiliates or any other party contained 
in this document or the related documents or for any failure by us or any other 
party to disclose events that may have occurred and may affect the significance 
or accuracy of such information.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5133>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5134><B><FONT
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Governing law</FONT></B><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5135>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 30.6pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA5136><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The indenture provides that it and the notes will be 
governed by, and construed in accordance with, the laws of the State of New 
York</FONT><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif;
FONT-SIZE: 10pt">.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5137>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5138 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5138 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5138 >S-
53</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5138 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA2719>&nbsp;&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5139><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF OTHER INDEBTEDNESS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5140>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5141><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>$40.0 Million Secured Debt Facility</B></FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5142>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5143><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In January&nbsp;2011, we, through our subsidiaries, 
completed a credit agreement with Credit Suisse where Credit Suisse provided a
$40.0 million secured debt facility to our power generation subsidiary, Empresa 
El&#233;ctrica Nueva Esperanza S.R.L. On April&nbsp;27, 2012, we and our 
subsidiaries, Empresa El&#233;ctrica Nueva Esperanza S.R.L. and BPZ E&amp;P, 
entered into a fourth amendment to the $40.0 million secured debt facility with 
Credit Suisse. In May 2013, we amended and restated the $40.0 million secured 
debt facility (which had been repaid by scheduled principal repayments to $25.5 
million) by increasing the facility size and borrowing an additional $14.5 
million. &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5144><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5145><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In 2013, the $14.5 million of proceeds from the amended 
and restated $40.0 million secured debt facility will be utilized to meet our 
2013 capital, exploration and development work programs as well as general 
corporate purposes. In 2011, the proceeds from the $40.0 million secured debt 
facility were utilized to meet our 2011 capital, exploration and development 
work programs, and to reduce other debt obligations.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5146><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5147><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In May 2013, as a result of amending and restating the 
$40.0 million secured debt facility (which had been repaid by scheduled 
principal repayments to $25.5 million) by increasing the facility size and 
borrowing an additional $14.5 million, we added $1.8 million of debt issue 
costs. The $1.8 million of new debt issue costs was combined with the remaining 
$0.6 million of unamortized debt issue costs and will be amortized over the 
remaining term, ending in January 2015, using the effective interest method. 
</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 39.6pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5148><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5149><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The $40.0 million secured debt facility, as amended, 
provides for ongoing fees payable to Credit Suisse including a Performance Based
Arranger Fee whose amount is determined by the change in the price of Brent 
crude oil at inception of the loan and the price at each principal repayment 
date in accordance with the original loan principal repayment dates, subject to 
a 18% ceiling of the original principal amount borrowed. For further information
on the Performance Based Arranger Fee, see Note-11, &#8220;Derivative Financial 
Instruments&#8221; and Note-13, &#8220;Fair Value Measurements and 
Disclosures&#8221; in our Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 
2012, incorporated by reference herein.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5150>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5151><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The $40.0 million secured debt facility is secured by 
three LM6000 gas-fired packaged power units (approximately $53.0 million as of 
June 30, 2013) that were purchased by us from GE through our power generation 
subsidiary, Empresa El&#233;ctrica Nueva Esperanza S.R.L. and the associated 
debt service reserve account. We and our subsidiary, BPZ E&amp;P, also agreed to
unconditionally guarantee the $40.0 million secured debt facility on an 
unsecured basis.&nbsp; </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 39.65pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5152><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5153><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The $40.0 million secured debt facility requires us to 
establish and maintain a debt service reserve account during the term of the
facility. At June 30, 2013, the debt service reserve account maintained a 
balance equal to the aggregate amount of payments of principal and interest on 
the $40.0 million secured debt facility due immediately on the succeeding 
principal repayment date.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 39.65pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5154><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5155><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The amended and restated $40.0 million secured debt 
facility matures in January 2015, with revised principal repayments due in 
quarterly installments of $4.0 million to $9.0 million commencing in July 2013 
and extending through January&nbsp;2015.&nbsp; The $40.0 million secured debt 
facility has an annual interest rate of the three month LIBOR rate plus 8%. 
Interest is due and payable quarterly.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5156><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5157><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The amended and restated $40.0 million secured debt 
facility subjects&nbsp;us to various financial covenants calculated as of the 
last day of each quarter, including a maximum consolidated leverage ratio, a 
maximum net consolidated leverage ratio, a minimum consolidated interest 
coverage ratio, a maximum consolidated capitalization ratio and minimum oil 
production quota per quarter. We were in compliance with these revised financial
covenants at June 30, 2013. We have received a waiver for the repurchase of a 
portion of our 6.50% Notes.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5158><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5159><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The $40.0 million secured debt facility provides for 
events of default customary for facilities of this type, the occurrence and 
continuation of which could result in the acceleration of amounts due under the 
facility. In addition, the $40.0 million secured debt facility provides for a 
mandatory repayment of the loans if we secure financing for its gas-to-power 
project.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5160><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5875.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK5875 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR5875 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM5875 >S-
54</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR5875 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA5875.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 
0pt" id=PARA5161><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The following table is the estimated remaining cash 
payments related to the $40.0 million secured debt facility, as amended and 
restated, and excluding potential payments for the Performance Based Arranger 
Fee but including interest payments (in thousands). </FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA5162><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>&nbsp;</B></FONT></P>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA2719>

<TD style="BORDER-BOTTOM: #000000 3px double; TEXT-ALIGN: right; BACKGROUND-
