<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3146><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>CAUTIONARY NOTE REGARDING FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3147><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3148><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">This prospectus contains forward-looking statements 
within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995, 
Section&nbsp;27A of the Securities Act and Section&nbsp;21E of the Exchange Act,
which concern our business. Such statements are not guarantees of future 
performance, and actual results could differ materially from those expressed or 
implied in such statements as a result of certain factors, including those set 
forth in &#8220;Risk Factors&#8221; in this prospectus and those discussed in 
the documents we have incorporated by reference. In some cases, you can identify
forward looking statement by terms such as, &#8220;may,&#8221; 
&#8220;will,&#8221; &#8220;should,&#8221; &#8220;could,&#8221; would,&#8221; 
&#8220;expects,&#8221; &#8220;plans,&#8221; &#8220;anticipates,&#8221; 
&#8220;intends,&#8221; &#8220;believes,&#8221; &#8220;estimates,&#8221; 
&#8220;projects,&#8221; &#8220;predicts,&#8221; &#8220;potential&#8221; and 
similar expressions intended to identify forward-looking statements. All 
statements, other than statements of historical facts, included or incorporated 
by reference in this prospectus that address activities, events or developments
we expect, believe, intend or anticipate will or may occur in the future, 
including the following matters, are forward looking statements:</FONT></P>

serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Ratio of earnings to fixed charges 
(1)</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 1%; FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; 
VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom" id=TBL3224.finRow.3.lead.2>&nbsp;</TD>

<TD style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 9%; FONT-FAMILY:

VERTICAL-ALIGN: bottom" id=TBL3224.finRow.3.amt.2>&#8212;</TD>
<TD style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #cceeff; WIDTH: 1%; FONT-FAMILY:

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3225><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</P>
<HR style="BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; TEXT-ALIGN: left; BORDER-LEFT: medium 
none; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 15%; HEIGHT: 1px; COLOR: #000000; 
MARGIN-LEFT: 0px; BORDER-TOP: medium none; BORDER-RIGHT: medium none">
</FONT>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3226><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"></P></FONT>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" id=PARA5732></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3227><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">(1)&nbsp;Earnings (loss) available for fixed charges for the nine months 
ended September&nbsp;30, 2010, and years ended December&nbsp;31, 2009 2008, 
2007, 2006 and 2005 were inadequate to cover fixed charges by $63.4 million, 
$46.6 million, $10.5 million, $21.2 million and $15.3 million and $6.3 million, 
respectively.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3228><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3229><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>USE OF PROCEEDS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3230><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3231><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Except as may be described in any prospectus supplement,
we currently intend to use the net proceeds from the sale of the securities for 
general corporate purposes, including without limitation, reduction or 
refinancing of debt or other corporate obligations, capital expenditures and for
working capital. Pending the application of the net proceeds, we intend to 
invest our net proceeds in short-term, investment-grade securities, interest-
bearing securities or guaranteed obligations of the United States or its 
agencies.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3232><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3233><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF DEBT SECURITIES</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3234><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3235><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">This section describes the general terms of debt 
securities to which any prospectus supplement may relate. A prospectus 
supplement will describe the terms relating to any debt securities to be offered
in greater detail, and may provide information that is different from this 
prospectus. If the information in the prospectus supplement differs with respect
to the particular debt securities being offered from this prospectus, you should
rely on the information in the prospectus supplement. The debt securities may be
issued from time to time in one or more series. The particular terms of each 
series that are offered by a prospectus supplement will be described in the 
prospectus supplement.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3236><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3237><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may conduct a portion of our operations through 
subsidiaries. Unless the debt securities are guaranteed by our subsidiaries as 
described below, the rights of our company and our creditors, including holders 
of the debt securities, to participate in the assets of any subsidiary upon the 
latter&#8217;s liquidation or reorganization will be subject to the prior claims
of the subsidiary&#8217;s creditors, except to the extent that we may ourself be
a creditor with recognized claims against such subsidiary.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3238><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3239><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The debt securities will be either our senior debt 
securities or our subordinated debt securities. The senior debt securities and 
the subordinated debt securities will be issued under separate indentures among 
us, and any domestic subsidiaries that become guarantors of the debt securities 
(and are added as co-registrants to the registration statement of which this 
prospectus supplement forms a part), and a trustee that meets certain 
requirements and is selected by us (the &#8220;Trustee&#8221;). Senior debt 
securities will be issued under a &#8220;Senior Indenture&#8221; and 
subordinated debt securities will be issued under a &#8220;Subordinated 
Indenture.&#8221; Together, the Senior Indenture and the Subordinated Indenture 
are called &#8220;Indentures.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3240><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3241><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We have summarized selected provisions of the Indentures
below. The summary is not complete and is qualified in its entirety by express 
reference to the provisions of the Indentures. The form of each Indenture has 
been filed with the SEC as an exhibit to the registration statement of which 
this prospectus is a part, and you should read the Indentures for provisions 
that may be important to you. In the summary below, we have included references 
to article or section numbers of the applicable Indenture so that you can easily
locate these provisions. Whenever we refer in this prospectus or in the 
prospectus supplement to particular article or sections or defined terms of the 
Indentures, those article or sections or defined terms are incorporated by 
reference herein or therein, as applicable. The Indentures will be subject to 
and governed by certain provisions of the Trust Indenture Act of 1939, and we 
refer you to the Indentures and the Trust Indenture Act for a statement of such 
provisions. Capitalized terms used in the summary have the meanings specified in
the Indentures.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6236.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6236 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6236 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6236 
>17</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6236 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6236.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3242><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3243><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>General</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3244><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3245><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may offer debt securities under this prospectus. The 
Indentures do not limit the aggregate amount of debt securities, and we may 
issue debt securities up to the aggregate principal amount which may be 
authorized from time to time by the board of directors. The Indentures provide 
that debt securities in separate series may be issued thereunder from time to 
time without limitation as to aggregate principal amount. We may specify a 
maximum aggregate principal amount for the debt securities of any series 
(Section&nbsp;301). We will determine the terms and conditions of the debt 
securities, including the maturity, principal and interest, but those terms must
be consistent with the Indenture. The debt securities will be our unsecured 
obligations.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3246><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3247><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The subordinated debt securities will be subordinated in
right of payment to the prior payment in full of all of our Senior Debt (as 
defined) as described under &#8220;&#8212;Subordination of Subordinated Debt 
Securities&#8221; and in the prospectus supplement applicable to any 
subordinated debt securities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3248><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3249><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If the prospectus supplement so indicates, the debt 
securities will be convertible into our common stock 
(Section&nbsp;301).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3250><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3251><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If specified in the prospectus supplement, one or more 
of our subsidiaries (the &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221;) will fully and 
unconditionally guarantee (the &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantees&#8221;) on a joint 
and several basis the debt securities as described under 
&#8220;&#8212;Subsidiary Guarantees&#8221; and in the prospectus supplement. The
Subsidiary Guarantees will be unsecured obligations of each Subsidiary 
Guarantor. Subsidiary Guarantees of subordinated debt securities will be 
subordinated to the Senior Debt of the Subsidiary Guarantors on the same basis 
as the subordinated debt securities are subordinated to our Senior Debt 
(Article&nbsp;Thirteen). The parent company has no independent assets or 
operations, the guarantees will be full and unconditional and joint and several,
and any subsidiaries of the parent company other than the subsidiary guarantors 
named in the registration statement of which this prospectus forms a part are 
minor.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3252><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3253><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The applicable prospectus supplement will set forth the 
price or prices at which the debt securities to be offered will be issued and 
will describe the following terms of such debt securities:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3254><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3255><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;the designation, aggregate 
principal amount and authorized denominations of the debt securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3256><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3257><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;whether the debt securities are 
senior debt securities or subordinated debt securities and, if subordinated debt
securities, the related subordination terms;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3258><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3259><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;whether the Subsidiary Guarantors
will provide Subsidiary Guarantees of the Debt Securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3260><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3261><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;any limit on the aggregate 
principal amount of the debt securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3262><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3263><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&nbsp;the dates on which the principal 
of the debt securities will be payable;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3264><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3265><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(6)&nbsp;the interest rate that the debt 
securities will bear and the interest payment dates for the debt 
securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3266><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3267><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(7)&nbsp;the places where payments on the 
debt securities will be payable;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3268><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3269><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(8)&nbsp;any terms upon which the debt 
securities may be redeemed, in whole or in part, at our option;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3270><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3271><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(9)&nbsp;any sinking fund or other
provisions that would obligate us to repurchase or otherwise redeem the debt 
securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3272><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3273><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(10)&nbsp;the portion of the principal 
amount, if less than all, of the debt securities that will be payable upon 
declaration of acceleration of the Maturity of the debt securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3274><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3275><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(11) whether the debt securities are 
defeasible;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3276><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3277><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(12) any addition to or change in the 
Events of Default;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3278><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3279><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(13) whether the debt securities are 
convertible into our common stock and, if so, the terms and conditions upon 
which conversion will be effected, including the initial conversion price or 
conversion rate and any adjustments thereto and the conversion 
period;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3280><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3281><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(14) any addition to or change in the 
covenants in the Indenture applicable to the debt securities; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3282><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3283><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(15) any other terms of the debt 
securities not inconsistent with the provisions of the Indenture 
(Section&nbsp;301).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3284><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6237.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6237 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6237 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6237 
>18</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6237 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6237.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3285><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Debt securities, including Original Issue Discount 
Securities, may be sold at a substantial discount below their principal amount. 
Special United States federal income tax considerations applicable to debt 
securities sold at an original issue discount may be described in the applicable
prospectus supplement. In addition, special United States federal income tax or 
other considerations applicable to any debt securities that are denominated in a
currency or currency unit other than United States dollars may be described in 
the applicable prospectus supplement.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3286><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3287><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Senior Debt Securities</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3288><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3289><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The senior debt securities will be our direct-unsecured 
obligations and will constitute senior indebtedness (in each case as defined in 
the applicable Supplemental Indenture) ranking on a parity with all of our other
unsecured and unsubordinated indebtedness.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3290><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3291><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Subordination of Subordinated Debt Securities</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3292><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3293><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The indebtedness evidenced by the subordinated debt 
securities will, to the extent set forth in the Subordinated Indenture with 
respect to each series of subordinated debt securities, be subordinate in right 
of payment to the prior payment in full of all of our Senior Debt, including the
senior debt securities, and it may also be senior in right of payment to all of 
our Subordinated Debt (Article&nbsp;Twelve of the Subordinated Indenture). The 
prospectus supplement relating to any subordinated debt securities will 
summarize the subordination provisions of the Subordinated Indenture applicable 
to that series including:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3294><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3295  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6246><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6238><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6239><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the applicability and effect of such provisions 
upon any payment or distribution respecting that series following any 
liquidation, dissolution or other winding-up, or any assignment for the benefit
of creditors or other marshaling of assets or any bankruptcy, insolvency or 
similar proceedings;</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA3296><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3297  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6245><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6240><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6241><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the applicability and effect of such provisions 
in the event of specified defaults with respect to any Senior Debt, including 
the circumstances under which and the periods in which we will be prohibited 
from making payments on the subordinated debt securities; 
and</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA3298><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3299  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6244><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6242><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6243><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the definition of Senior Debt applicable to the 
subordinated debt securities of that series and, if the series is issued on a 
senior subordinated basis, the definition of Subordinated Debt applicable to 
that series.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 36pt" id=PARA3300><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3301><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The prospectus supplement will also describe as of a 
recent date the approximate amount of Senior Debt to which the subordinated debt
securities of that series will be subordinated.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3302><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3303><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The failure to make any payment on any of the 
subordinated debt securities by reason of the subordination provisions of the 
Subordinated Indenture described in the prospectus supplement will not be 
construed as preventing the occurrence of an Event of Default with respect to
the subordinated debt securities arising from any such failure to make 
payment.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3304><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3305><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The subordination provisions described above will not be
applicable to payments in respect of the subordinated debt securities from a 
defeasance trust established in connection with any legal defeasance or covenant
defeasance of the subordinated debt securities as described under 
&#8220;&#8212;Legal Defeasance and Covenant Defeasance.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3306><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3307><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Subsidiary Guarantees</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3308><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3309><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If specified in the prospectus supplement, the 
Subsidiary Guarantors will guarantee the debt securities of a series. Unless 
otherwise indicated in the prospectus supplement, the following provisions will 
apply to the Subsidiary Guarantees of the Subsidiary Guarantors.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3310><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3311><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject to the limitations described below and in the 
prospectus supplement, the Subsidiary Guarantors will, jointly and severally, 
fully and unconditionally guarantee the punctual payment when due, whether at 
Stated Maturity, by acceleration or otherwise, of all our payment obligations 
under the Indentures and the debt securities of a series, whether for principal 
of, premium, if any, or interest on the debt securities or otherwise (all such 
obligations guaranteed by a Subsidiary Guarantor being herein called the 
&#8220;Guaranteed Obligations&#8221;). The Subsidiary Guarantors will also pay 
all expenses (including reasonable counsel fees and expenses) incurred by the 
applicable Trustee in enforcing any rights under a Subsidiary Guarantee with 
respect to a Subsidiary Guarantor (Section&nbsp;1302).</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6247.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6247 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6247 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6247 
>19</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6247 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6247.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3312><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3313><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In the case of subordinated debt securities, a 
Subsidiary Guarantor&#8217;s Subsidiary Guarantee will be subordinated in right 
of payment to the Senior Debt of such Subsidiary Guarantor on the same basis as 
the subordinated debt securities are subordinated to our Senior Debt. No payment
will be made by any Subsidiary Guarantor under its Subsidiary Guarantee during 
any period in which payments by us on the subordinated debt securities are
suspended by the subordination provisions of the Subordinated Indenture 
(Article&nbsp;Fourteen of the Subordinated Indenture).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3314><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3315><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Each Subsidiary Guarantee will be limited in amount to 
an amount not to exceed the maximum amount that can be guaranteed by the 
relevant Subsidiary Guarantor without rendering such Subsidiary Guarantee 
voidable under applicable law relating to fraudulent conveyance or fraudulent 
transfer or similar laws affecting the rights of creditors generally 
(Section&nbsp;1306).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3316><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3317><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Each Subsidiary Guarantee will be a continuing guarantee
and will:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3318><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3319><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;remain in full force and effect until either 
(a)&nbsp;payment in full of all the applicable debt securities (or such debt 
securities are otherwise satisfied and discharged in accordance with the 
provisions of the applicable Indenture) or (b)&nbsp;released as described in the
following paragraph;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3320><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3321><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;be binding upon each Subsidiary Guarantor; 
and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3322><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3323><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;inure to the benefit of and be enforceable by 
the applicable Trustee, the Holders and their successors, transferees and 
assigns.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3324><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3325><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In the event that a Subsidiary Guarantor ceases to be a 
Subsidiary, either legal defeasance or covenant defeasance occurs with respect 
to the series or all or substantially all of the assets or all of the Capital 
Stock of such Subsidiary Guarantor is sold, including by way of sale, merger, 
consolidation or otherwise, such Subsidiary Guarantor will be released and 
discharged of its obligations under its Subsidiary Guarantee without any further
action required on the part of the Trustee or any Holder, and no other person 
acquiring or owning the assets or Capital Stock of such Subsidiary Guarantor 
will be required to enter into a Subsidiary Guarantee (Section&nbsp;1304). In 
addition, the prospectus supplement may specify additional circumstances under 
which a Subsidiary Guarantor can be released from its Subsidiary 
Guarantee.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3326><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3327><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Form, Exchange and Transfer</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3328><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3329><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The debt securities of each series will be issuable only
in fully registered form, without coupons, and, unless otherwise specified in 
the applicable prospectus supplement, only in denominations of $1,000 and 
integral multiples thereof (Section&nbsp;302).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3330><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3331><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">At the option of the Holder, subject to the terms of the
applicable Indenture and the limitations applicable to Global Securities, debt 
securities of each series will be exchangeable for other debt securities of the 
same series of any authorized denomination and of a like tenor and aggregate 
principal amount (Section&nbsp;305).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3332><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3333><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject to the terms of the applicable Indenture and the
limitations applicable to Global Securities, debt securities may be presented 
for exchange as provided above or for registration of transfer (duly endorsed or
with the form of transfer endorsed thereon duly executed) at the office of the 
Security Registrar or at the office of any transfer agent designated by us for 
such purpose. No service charge will be made for any registration of transfer or
exchange of debt securities, but we may require payment of a sum sufficient to 
cover any tax or other governmental charge payable in that connection. Such 
transfer or exchange will be effected upon the Security Registrar or such 
transfer agent, as the case may be, being satisfied with the documents of title 
and identity of the person making the request. The Security Registrar and any 
other transfer agent initially designated by us for any debt securities will be 
named in the applicable prospectus supplement (Section&nbsp;305). We may at any 
time designate additional transfer agents or rescind the designation of any 
transfer agent or approve a change in the office through which any transfer 
agent acts, except that we will be required to maintain a transfer agent in each
Place of Payment for the debt securities of each series 
(Section&nbsp;1002).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3334><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3335><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If the debt securities of any series (or of any series 
and specified tenor) are to be redeemed in part, we will not be required to 
(1)&nbsp;issue, register the transfer of or exchange any debt security of that 
series (or of that series and specified tenor, as the case may be) during a 
period beginning at the opening of business 15 days before the day of mailing of
a notice of redemption of any such debt security that may be selected for 
redemption and ending at the close of business on the day of such mailing or 
(2)&nbsp;register the transfer of or exchange any debt security so selected for 
redemption, in whole or in part, except the unredeemed portion of any such debt 
security being redeemed in part (Section&nbsp;305).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3336><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6248.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6248 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6248 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6248 
>20</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6248 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6248.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3337><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Global Securities</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3338><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3339><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Some or all of the debt securities of any series may be 
represented, in whole or in part, by one or more Global Securities that will 
have an aggregate principal amount equal to that of the debt securities they 
represent. Each Global Security will be registered in the name of a Depositary 
or its nominee identified in the applicable prospectus supplement, will be 
deposited with such Depositary or nominee or its custodian and will bear a 
legend regarding the restrictions on exchanges and registration of transfer 
thereof referred to below and any such other matters as may be provided for 
pursuant to the applicable Indenture.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3340><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3341><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Notwithstanding any provision of the Indentures or any 
debt security described in this prospectus, no Global Security may be exchanged 
in whole or in part for debt securities registered, and no transfer of a Global 
Security in whole or in part may be registered, in the name of any person other 
than the Depositary for such Global Security or any nominee of such Depositary 
unless:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3342><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3343><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;the Depositary has notified us 
that it is unwilling or unable to continue as Depositary for such Global 
Security or has ceased to be qualified to act as such as required by the 
applicable Indenture, and in either case we fail to appoint a successor 
Depositary within 90 days;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3344><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3345><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;an Event of Default with respect 
to the debt securities represented by such Global Security has occurred and is 
continuing and the Trustee has received a written request from the Depositary to
issue certificated debt securities; or</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3346><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3347><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;other circumstances exist, in 
addition to or in lieu of those described above, as may be described in the
applicable prospectus supplement.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3348><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3349><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">All debt securities issued in exchange for a Global 
Security or any portion thereof will be registered in such names as the 
Depositary may direct (Sections 205 and 305).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3350><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3351><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">As long as the Depositary, or its nominee, is the 
registered holder of a Global Security, the Depositary or such nominee, as the 
case may be, will be considered the sole owner and Holder of such Global 
Security and the debt securities that it represents for all purposes under the 
debt securities and the applicable Indenture (Section&nbsp;308). Except in the 
limited circumstances referred to above, owners of beneficial interests in a 
Global Security will not be entitled to have such Global Security or any debt 
securities that it represents registered in their names, will not receive or be 
entitled to receive physical delivery of certificated debt securities in 
exchange for those interests and will not be considered to be the owners or 
Holders of such Global Security or any debt securities that is represents for 
any purpose under the debt securities or the applicable Indenture. All payments 
on a Global Security will be made to the Depositary or its nominee, as the case 
may be, as the Holder of the security. The laws of some jurisdictions require 
that some purchasers of debt securities take physical delivery of such debt 
securities in definitive form. These laws may impair the ability to transfer 
beneficial interests in a Global Security.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3352><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3353><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Ownership of beneficial interests in a Global Security 
will be limited to institutions that have accounts with the Depositary or its 
nominee (&#8220;participants&#8221;) and to persons that may hold beneficial 
interests through participants. In connection with the issuance of any Global 
Security, the Depositary will credit, on its book-entry registration and 
transfer system, the respective principal amounts of debt securities represented
by the Global Security to the accounts of its participants. Ownership of 
beneficial interests in a Global Security will be shown only on, and the 
transfer of those ownership interests will be effected only through, records 
maintained by the Depositary (with respect to participants&#8217; interests) or 
any such participant (with respect to interests of persons held by such 
participants on their behalf). Payments, transfers, exchanges and other matters 
relating to beneficial interests in a Global Security may be subject to various 
policies and procedures adopted by the Depositary from time to time. None of us,
the Subsidiary Guarantors, the Trustees or the agents of ourself, the Subsidiary
Guarantors or the Trustees will have any responsibility or liability for any 
aspect of the Depositary&#8217;s or any participant&#8217;s records relating to,
or for payments made on account of, beneficial interests in a Global Security, 
or for maintaining, supervising or reviewing any records relating to such 
beneficial interests.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3354><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3355><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Payment and Paying Agents</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3356><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3357><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Unless otherwise indicated in the applicable prospectus 
supplement, payment of interest on a debt security on any Interest Payment Date 
will be made to the Person in whose name such debt security (or one or more 
Predecessor Securities) is registered at the close of business on the Regular 
Record Date for such interest (Section&nbsp;307).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3358><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3359><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Unless otherwise indicated in the applicable prospectus 
supplement, principal of and any premium and interest on the debt securities of 
a particular series will be payable at the office of such Paying Agent or Paying
Agents as we may designate for such purpose from time to time, except that at 
our option payment of any interest on debt securities in certificated form may 
be made by check mailed to the address of the Person entitled thereto as such 
address appears in the Security Register. Unless otherwise indicated in the 
applicable prospectus supplement, the corporate trust office of the Trustee 
under the Senior Indenture in the City of New York will be designated as sole 
Paying Agent for payments with respect to senior debt securities of each series,
and the corporate trust office of the Trustee under the Subordinated Indenture 
in the City of New York will be designated as the sole Paying Agent for payment 
with respect to subordinated debt securities of each series. Any other Paying 
Agents initially designated by us for the debt securities of a particular series
will be named in the applicable prospectus supplement. We may at any time 
designate additional Paying Agents or rescind the designation of any Paying 
Agent or approve a change in the office through which any Paying Agent acts, 
except that we will be required to maintain a Paying Agent in each Place of 
Payment for the debt securities of a particular series 
(Section&nbsp;1002).</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6249.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6249 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6249 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6249 
>21</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6249 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6249.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3360><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3361><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">All money paid by us to a Paying Agent for the payment 
of the principal of or any premium or interest on any debt security which remain
unclaimed at the end of two years after such principal, premium or interest has 
become due and payable will be repaid to us, and the Holder of such debt 
security thereafter may look only to us for payment 
(Section&nbsp;1003).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3362><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3363><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Consolidation, Merger and Sale of Assets</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3364><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3365><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may not consolidate with or merge into, or transfer, 
lease or otherwise dispose of all or substantially all of our assets to, any 
Person (a &#8220;successor Person&#8221;), and may not permit any Person to 
consolidate with or merge into us, unless:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3366><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3367><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;the successor Person (if any) is 
a corporation, partnership, trust or other entity organized and validly existing
under the laws of any domestic jurisdiction and assumes our obligations on the 
debt securities and under the Indentures including the due and punctual payment 
of the principal of, any premium on, and any interest on, all of the outstanding
debt securities and the performance of every covenant applicable to be performed
or observed by us;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3368><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3369><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;immediately before and after 
giving pro forma effect to the transaction, no Event of Default, and no event 
which, after notice or lapse of time or both, would become an Event of Default, 
has occurred and is continuing;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3370><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3371><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;we deliver to the trustee an 
officer&#8217;s certificate and an opinion of counsel, each stating that such 
consolidation, merger, conveyance or transfer and such Supplemental Indenture 
comply with the foregoing provisions relating to such transaction; 
and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3372><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3373><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;several other conditions, 
including any additional conditions with respect to any particular debt 
securities specified in the applicable prospectus supplement, are met 
(Section&nbsp;801).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3374><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3375><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Events of Default</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3376><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3377><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Unless otherwise specified in the prospectus supplement,
each of the following will constitute an Event of Default under the applicable 
Indenture with respect to debt securities of any series:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3378><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3379><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;failure to pay principal of or 
any premium on any debt security of that series when due, whether or not, in the
case of subordinated debt securities, such payment is prohibited by the 
subordination provisions of the Subordinated Indenture;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3380><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3381><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;failure to pay any interest on 
any debt securities of that series when due, continued for 30 days, whether or 
not, in the case of subordinated debt securities, such payment is prohibited by 
the subordination provisions of the Subordinated Indenture;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3382><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3383><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;failure to deposit any sinking 
fund payment, when due, in respect of any debt security of that series, whether 
or not, in the case of subordinated debt securities, such deposit is prohibited 
by the subordination provisions of the Subordinated Indenture;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3384><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3385><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;failure to perform or comply with
the provisions described under &#8220;&#8212;Consolidation, Merger and Sale of 
Assets&#8221;;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3386><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3387><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&nbsp;failure to perform any of our 
other covenants in such Indenture (other than a covenant included in such 
Indenture solely for the benefit of a series other than that series), continued 
for 60 days after written notice has been given by the applicable Trustee, or 
the Holders of at least 25% in principal amount of the Outstanding debt 
securities of that series, as provided in such Indenture; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3388><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3389><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(6)&nbsp;certain events of bankruptcy, 
insolvency or reorganization affecting us or any Significant 
Subsidiary.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3390><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3391><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(7)&nbsp;if any Subsidiary Guarantor has 
guaranteed such series, the Subsidiary Guarantee of any such Subsidiary 
Guarantor is held by a final non-appealable order or judgment of a court of 
competent jurisdiction to be unenforceable or invalid or ceases for any reason 
to be in full force and effect (other than in accordance with the terms of the 
applicable Indenture) or any Subsidiary Guarantor or any Person acting on behalf
of any Subsidiary Guarantor denies or disaffirms such Subsidiary 
Guarantor&#8217;s obligations under its Subsidiary Guarantee (other than by 
reason of a release of such Subsidiary Guarantor from its Subsidiary Guarantee 
in accordance with the terms of the applicable Indenture)
(Section&nbsp;501).</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6250.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6250 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6250 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6250 
>22</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6250 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6250.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3392><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3393><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If an Event of Default (other than an Event of Default 
with respect to BPZ Resources,&nbsp;Inc. described in clause (6)&nbsp;above) 
with respect to the debt securities of any series at the time Outstanding occurs
and is continuing, either the applicable Trustee or the Holders of at least 25% 
in principal amount of the Outstanding debt securities of that series by notice 
as provided in the Indenture may declare the principal amount of the debt 
securities of that series (or, in the case of any debt security that is an 
Original Issue Discount Security, such portion of the principal amount of such 
debt security as may be specified in the terms of such debt security) to be due 
and payable immediately. If an Event of Default with respect to BPZ Resources 
described in clause (6)&nbsp;above with respect to the debt securities of any 
series at the time Outstanding occurs, the principal amount of all the debt 
securities of that series (or, in the case of any such Original Issue Discount 
Security, such specified amount) will automatically, and without any action by 
the applicable Trustee or any Holder, become immediately due and payable. After 
any such acceleration, but before a judgment or decree based on acceleration, 
the Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding debt securities
of that series may, under certain circumstances, rescind and annul such 
acceleration if all Events of Default, other than the non-payment of accelerated
principal (or other specified amount), have been cured or waived as provided in 
the applicable Indenture (Section&nbsp;502). For information as to waiver of 
defaults, see &#8220;&#8212;Modification and Waiver&#8221; below.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3394><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3395><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">A default under other indebtedness of the Company will 
not be a default under the Indentures and a default under one series of debt 
securities will not necessarily be a default under another series. Any 
additions, deletions or other changes to the Events of Default which will apply 
to a series of debt securities will be described in the prospectus supplement 
relating to such series of debt securities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3396><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3397><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Under the Indentures, the trustee must give to the 
holders of each series of debt securities notice of all uncured defaults known 
to it with respect to such series within 90 days after such a default occurs 
(the term default to include the events specified above without notice or grace 
periods). However, except in the case of default in the payment of principal of,
any premium on, or any interest on any of the debt securities, or default in the
payment of any sinking or purchase fund installment or analogous obligations, 
the trustee shall be protected in withholding such notice if it in good faith 
determines that the withholding of such notice is in the interests of the 
holders of the debt securities of such series (Section&nbsp;602).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3398><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3399><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Subject to the provisions of the Indentures relating to 
the duties of the Trustees in case an Event of Default has occurred and is 
continuing, each Trustee will be under no obligation to exercise any of its 
rights or powers under the applicable Indenture at the request or direction of 
any of the Holders, unless such Holders have offered to such Trustee reasonable 
indemnity (Section&nbsp;603). Subject to such provisions for the indemnification
of the Trustees, the Holders of a majority in principal amount of the 
Outstanding debt securities of any series will have the right to direct the 
time, method and place of conducting any proceeding for any remedy available to 
the Trustee or exercising any trust or power conferred on the Trustee with 
respect to the debt securities of that series (Section&nbsp;512).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3400><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3401><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">No Holder of a debt security of any series will have any
right to institute any proceeding with respect to the applicable Indenture, or 
for the appointment of a receiver or a trustee, or for any other remedy 
thereunder, unless:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3402><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3403><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;such Holder has previously given 
to the Trustee under the applicable Indenture written notice of a continuing 
Event of Default with respect to the debt securities of that series;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3404><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3405><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;the Holders of at least 25% in 
principal amount of the Outstanding debt securities of that series have made 
written request, and such Holder or Holders have offered reasonable indemnity, 
to the Trustee to institute such proceeding as trustee; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3406><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3407><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;the Trustee has failed to 
institute such proceeding, and has not received from the Holders of a majority 
in principal amount of the Outstanding debt securities of that series a 
direction inconsistent with such request, within 60 days after such notice, 
request and offer (Section&nbsp;507).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3408><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3409><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">However, such limitations do not apply to a suit 
instituted by a Holder of a debt security for the enforcement of payment of the 
principal of or any premium or interest on such debt security on or after the 
applicable due date specified in such debt security or, if applicable, to 
convert such debt security (Section&nbsp;508).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3410><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3411><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We will be required to furnish to each Trustee annually 
a statement by certain of our officers as to whether or not we, to their 
knowledge, are in default in the performance or observance of any of the terms, 
provisions and conditions of the applicable Indenture and, if so, specifying all
such known defaults (Section&nbsp;1004).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3412><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6251.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6251 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6251 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6251 
>23</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6251 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6251.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3413><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Modification and Waiver</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3414><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3415><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We and the trustee may, without the consent of the 
holders of the debt securities, enter into one or more Supplemental Indentures 
for, among others, one or more of the following purposes, provided that in the 
case of clauses (2), (3), (4)&nbsp;and (6), the interests of the holders of debt
securities would not be adversely affected:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3416><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
