<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3417><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;to evidence the succession of 
another corporation to us, and the assumption by such successor of our 
obligations under the applicable Indenture and the debt securities of any 
series;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3418><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3419><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;to add covenants by us, or 
surrender any of our rights conferred by the applicable Indenture, for the 
benefit of the holders of debt securities of any or all series;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3420><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3421><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;to cure any ambiguity, omission, 
defect or inconsistency in or make any other provision with respect to questions
arising under the applicable Indenture;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3422><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3423><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;to establish the form or terms of
any series of debt securities, including any subordinated securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3424><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3425><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&nbsp;to evidence and provide for the 
acceptance of any successor trustee with respect to one or more series of debt 
securities or to facilitate the administration of the trusts thereunder by one 
or more trustees in accordance with the applicable Indenture; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3426><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3427><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(6)&nbsp;to provide any additional Events 
of Default (Section&nbsp;901).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3428><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3429><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Modifications and amendments of an Indenture may be made
by us, the Subsidiary Guarantors, if applicable, and the applicable Trustee with
the consent of the Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding 
debt securities of each series affected by such modification or amendment; 
provided, however, that no such modification or amendment may, without the 
consent of the Holder of each Outstanding debt security affected 
thereby:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3430><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3431><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;change the Stated Maturity of the
principal of, or any installment of principal of or interest on, any debt 
security;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3432><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3433><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;reduce the principal amount of, 
or any premium or interest on, any debt security;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3434><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3435><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;reduce the amount of principal of
an Original Issue Discount Security or any other debt security payable upon 
acceleration of the Maturity thereof;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3436><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3437><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;change the place or currency of 
payment of principal of, or any premium or interest on, any debt 
security;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3438><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3439><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&nbsp;impair the right to institute 
suit for the enforcement of any payment due on or any conversion right with 
respect to any debt security;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3440><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3441><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(6)&nbsp;modify the subordination 
provisions in the case of subordinated debt securities, or modify any conversion
provisions, in either case in a manner adverse to the Holders of the 
subordinated debt securities;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3442><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3443><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(7)&nbsp;except as provided in the 
applicable Indenture, release the Subsidiary Guarantee of a Subsidiary 
Guarantor;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3444><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3445><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(8)&nbsp;reduce the percentage in 
principal amount of Outstanding debt securities of any series, the consent of 
whose Holders is required for modification or amendment of the 
Indenture;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3446><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3447><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(9)&nbsp;reduce the percentage in 
principal amount of Outstanding debt securities of any series necessary for 
waiver of compliance with certain provisions of the Indenture or for waiver of 
certain defaults; or</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3448><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3449><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(10)&nbsp;modify such provisions with 
respect to modification, amendment or waiver (Section&nbsp;902).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3450><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3451><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Holders of a majority in principal amount of the 
Outstanding debt securities of any series may waive compliance by us with 
certain restrictive provisions of the applicable Indenture (Section&nbsp;1009). 
The Holders of a majority in principal amount of the Outstanding debt securities
of any series may waive any past default under the applicable Indenture, except 
a default in the payment of principal, premium or interest and certain covenants
and provisions of the Indenture which cannot be amended without the consent of 
the Holder of each Outstanding debt security of such series 
(Section&nbsp;513).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3452><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6252.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6252 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6252 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6252 
>24</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6252 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6252.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3453><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Each of the Indentures provides that in determining 
whether the Holders of the requisite principal amount of the Outstanding debt 
securities have given or taken any direction, notice, consent, waiver or other 
action under such Indenture as of any date:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3454><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3455><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;the principal amount of an 
Original Issue Discount Security that will be deemed to be Outstanding will be 
the amount of the principal that would be due and payable as of such date upon 
acceleration of maturity to such date;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3456><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3457><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;if, as of such date, the 
principal amount payable at the Stated Maturity of a debt security is not 
determinable (for example, because it is based on an index), the principal 
amount of such debt security deemed to be Outstanding as of such date will be an
amount determined in the manner prescribed for such debt security; 
and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3458><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3459><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;the principal amount of a debt 
security denominated in one or more foreign currencies or currency units that 
will be deemed to be Outstanding will be the United States-dollar equivalent, 
determined as of such date in the manner prescribed for such debt security, of 
the principal amount of such debt security (or, in the case of a debt security 
described in clause (1)&nbsp;or (2)&nbsp;above, of the amount described in such 
clause).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3460><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3461><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Certain debt securities, including those owned by us or 
any of our other Affiliates, will not be deemed to be Outstanding 
(Section&nbsp;101).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3462><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3463><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Except in certain limited circumstances, we will be 
entitled to set any day as a record date for the purpose of determining the 
Holders of Outstanding debt securities of any series entitled to give or take
any direction, notice, consent, waiver or other action under the applicable 
Indenture, in the manner and subject to the limitations provided in the 
Indenture. In certain limited circumstances, the Trustee will be entitled to set
a record date for action by Holders. If a record date is set for any action to 
be taken by Holders of a particular series, only persons who are Holders of 
Outstanding debt securities of that series on the record date may take such 
action. To be effective, such action must be taken by Holders of the requisite 
principal amount of such debt securities within a specified period following the
record date. For any particular record date, this period will be 180 days or 
such other period as may be specified by us (or the Trustee, if it set the 
record date), and may be shortened or lengthened (but not beyond 180 days) from 
time to time (Section&nbsp;104).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3464><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3465><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Satisfaction and Discharge</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3466><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3467><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Each Indenture will be discharged and will cease to be 
of further effect as to all Outstanding debt securities of any series issued 
thereunder, when:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3468><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3469><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;either:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3470><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 20.9pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 8.8pt" id=PARA3471><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(a)&nbsp;all Outstanding debt securities 
of that series that have been authenticated (except lost, stolen or destroyed 
debt securities that have been replaced or paid and debt securities for whose 
payment money has theretofore been deposited in trust and thereafter repaid to 
us) have been delivered to the Trustee for cancellation; or</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 20.9pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 8.8pt" id=PARA3472><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 20.9pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 8.8pt" id=PARA3473><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(b)&nbsp;all outstanding debt securities 
of that series that have not been delivered to the Trustee for cancellation have
become due and payable or will become due and payable at their Stated Maturity 
within one year or are to be called for redemption within one year under 
arrangements satisfactory to the Trustee and in any case we have irrevocably 
deposited with the Trustee as trust funds money in an amount sufficient, without
consideration of any reinvestment of interest, to pay the entire indebtedness of
such debt securities not delivered to the Trustee for cancellation, for 
principal, premium, if any, and accrued interest to the Stated Maturity or 
redemption date;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 20.9pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 8.8pt" id=PARA3474><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3475><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;we have paid or caused to be paid
all other sums payable by us under the Indenture with respect to the debt
securities of that series; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3476><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3477><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;we have delivered an 
Officers&#8217; Certificate and an Opinion of Counsel to the Trustee stating 
that all conditions precedent to satisfaction and discharge of the Indenture 
with respect to the debt securities of that series have been satisfied 
(Article&nbsp;Four).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3478><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3479><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Legal Defeasance and Covenant Defeasance</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3480><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3481><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If and to the extent indicated in the applicable 
prospectus supplement, we may elect, at our option at any time, to have the 
provisions of Section&nbsp;1502, relating to defeasance and discharge of 
indebtedness, which we call &#8220;legal defeasance&#8221; or Section&nbsp;1503,
relating to defeasance of certain restrictive covenants applied to the debt 
securities of any series, or to any specified part of a series, which we call 
&#8220;covenant defeasance&#8221; (Section&nbsp;1501).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3482><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6253.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6253 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6253 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6253 
>25</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6253 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6253.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3483><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><I>Legal Defeasance</I>. The Indentures provide that, 
upon our exercise of our option (if any) to have Section&nbsp;1502 applied to 
any debt securities, we will be discharged from all our obligations, and, if 
such debt securities are subordinated debt securities, the provisions of the 
Subordinated Indenture relating to subordination will cease to be effective, 
with respect to such debt securities (except for certain obligations to convert,
exchange or register the transfer of debt securities, to replace stolen, lost or
mutilated debt securities, to maintain paying agencies and to hold moneys for 
payment in trust) upon the deposit in trust for the benefit of the Holders of 
such debt securities of money or United States Government Obligations, or both, 
which, through the payment of principal and interest in respect thereof in 
accordance with their terms, will provide money in an amount sufficient to pay 
the principal of and any premium and interest on such debt securities on the 
respective Stated Maturities in accordance with the terms of the applicable 
Indenture and such debt securities. Such defeasance or discharge may occur only 
if, among other things:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3484><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3485><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;we have delivered to the 
applicable Trustee an Opinion of Counsel to the effect that we have received 
from, or there has been published by, the United States Internal Revenue Service
a ruling, or there has been a change in tax law, in either case to the effect 
that Holders of such debt securities will not recognize gain or loss for federal
income tax purposes as a result of such deposit and legal defeasance and will be
subject to federal income tax on the same amount, in the same manner and at the 
same times as would have been the case if such deposit and legal defeasance were
not to occur;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3486><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3487><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;no Event of Default or event that
with the passing of time or the giving of notice, or both, shall constitute an 
Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing at the time of such 
deposit or, with respect to any Event of Default described in clause 
(6)&nbsp;under &#8220;&#8212;Events of Default,&#8221; at any time until 121 
days after such deposit;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3488><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3489><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;such deposit and legal defeasance
will not result in a breach or violation of, or constitute a default under, any 
agreement or instrument to which we are a party or by which we are 
bound;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3490><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3491><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;in the case of subordinated debt 
securities, at the time of such deposit, no default in the payment of all or a 
portion of principal of (or premium, if any) or interest on any of our Senior 
Debt shall have occurred and be continuing, no event of default shall have 
resulted in the acceleration of any of our Senior Debt and no other event of 
default with respect to any of our Senior Debt shall have occurred and be 
continuing permitting after notice or the lapse of time, or both, the 
acceleration thereof; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3492><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3493><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&nbsp;we have delivered to the Trustee 
an Opinion of Counsel to the effect that such deposit shall not cause the 
Trustee or the trust so created to be subject to the Investment Company Act of 
1940 (Sections 1502 and 1504).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3494><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3495><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><I>Covenant Defeasance</I>. The Indentures provide that,
upon our exercise of our option (if any) to have Section&nbsp;1503 applied to 
any debt securities, we may omit to comply with certain restrictive covenants 
(but not to conversion, if applicable), including those that may be described in
the applicable prospectus supplement, the occurrence of certain Events of 
Default, which are described above in clause (5)&nbsp;(with respect to such 
restrictive covenants) and clause (6)&nbsp;(with respect only to Significant
Subsidiaries) under &#8220;Events of Default&#8221; and any that may be 
described in the applicable prospectus supplement, will not be deemed to either 
be or result in an Event of Default and, if such debt securities are 
subordinated debt securities, the provisions of the Subordinated Indenture 
relating to subordination will cease to be effective, in each case with respect 
to such debt securities. In order to exercise such option, we must deposit, in 
trust for the benefit of the Holders of such debt securities, money or United 
States Government Obligations, or both, which, through the payment of principal 
and interest in respect thereof in accordance with their terms, will provide 
money in an amount sufficient to pay the principal of and any premium and 
interest on such debt securities on the respective Stated Maturities in 
accordance with the terms of the applicable Indenture and such debt securities. 
Such covenant defeasance may occur only if we have delivered to the applicable 
Trustee an Opinion of Counsel that in effect says that Holders of such debt 
securities will not recognize gain or loss for federal income tax purposes as a 
result of such deposit and covenant defeasance and will be subject to federal 
income tax on the same amount, in the same manner and at the same times as would
have been the case if such deposit and covenant defeasance were not to occur, 
and the requirements set forth in clauses (2), (3), (4)&nbsp;and (5)&nbsp;above 
are satisfied. If we exercise this option with respect to any debt securities 
and such debt securities were declared due and payable because of the occurrence
of any Event of Default, the amount of money and United States Government 
Obligations so deposited in trust would be sufficient to pay amounts due on such
debt securities at the time of their respective Stated Maturities but may not be
sufficient to pay amounts due on such debt securities upon any acceleration 
resulting from such Event of Default. In such case, we would remain liable for 
such payments (Sections 1503 and 1504).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3496><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3497><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If we exercise either our legal defeasance or covenant 
defeasance option, any Subsidiary Guarantees will terminate 
(Section&nbsp;1304).</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6254.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6254 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6254 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6254 
>26</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6254 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6254.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3498><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3499><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Notices</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3500><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3501><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Notices to Holders of debt securities will be given by 
mail to the addresses of such Holders as they may appear in the Security 
Register (Sections 101 and 106).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3502><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3503><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:
10pt"><B>Title</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3504><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3505><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We, the Subsidiary Guarantors, the Trustees and any 
agent of us, the Subsidiary Guarantors or a Trustee may treat the Person in 
whose name a debt security is registered as the absolute owner of the debt 
security (whether or not such debt security may be overdue) for the purpose of 
making payment and for all other purposes (Section&nbsp;308).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3506><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3507><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Governing Law</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3508><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3509><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Indentures and the debt securities will be governed 
by, and construed in accordance with, the law of the State of New York 
(Section&nbsp;112).</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3510><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3511><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF CAPITAL STOCK</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3512><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3513><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may offer common stock, no par value per share, and 
preferred stock, no par value per share, under this prospectus. Our authorized 
capital stock currently consists of 250,000,000 shares of common stock and 
25,000,000 shares of preferred stock. At December&nbsp;1, 2010, 115,507,866 
shares of common stock were issued and outstanding and no shares of preferred 
stock were issued and outstanding. The following summary of certain provisions 
of our capital stock does not purport to be complete and is subject to and is 
qualified in its entirety by our articles of incorporation and by-laws, which 
are incorporated in this prospectus by reference as exhibits to the registration
statement of which this prospectus forms a part, and by the provisions of 
applicable law.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3514><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3515><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Common Stock</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3516><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3517><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Company has two hundred seventy-five million 
(275,000,000) shares, of which two hundred fifty million (250,000,000) shares 
are designated as common stock, no par value and twenty-five million 
(25,000,000) shares are designated as preferred stock, no par value, authorized 
by its Certificate of Formation. The holders of the common stock of the Company 
shall be entitled at all meetings of shareholders to one vote for each share of
such stock held by them. Cumulative voting is expressly prohibited by the 
Certificate of Formation. The Company&#8217;s Bylaws provide that with respect 
to any matter, a quorum shall be present at a meeting of shareholders if the 
holders of a majority of the shares entitled to vote on that matter are 
represented at the meeting in person or by proxy.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3518><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3519><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Shareholders of the Company have no preemptive rights to
acquire additional shares of common stock or other securities. The common stock 
is not subject to redemption and carries no subscription or conversion rights. 
In the event of liquidation of the Company, the shares of common stock are 
entitled to share equally in corporate assets after satisfaction of all 
liabilities. Holders of common stock are entitled to receive such dividends as 
the Board of Directors may from time to time declare out of funds legally 
available for the payment of dividends. The Company seeks growth and expansion 
of its business through the reinvestment of profits, if any, and does not 
anticipate that it will pay dividends in the foreseeable future.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3520><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3521><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Board of Directors has the authority to issue the 
authorized but unissued shares of common stock without action by the 
shareholders. Any future issuance of such shares would reduce the percentage 
ownership held by existing shareholders and might dilute the book value of their
shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3522><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3523><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The shares of our common stock presently outstanding are
fully paid and non-assessable, and any shares issued by us pursuant to this 
prospectus will be fully paid and non-assessable when issued. Our common stock 
trades on the NYSE under the symbol &#8220;BPZ.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3524><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3525><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Preferred Stock</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3526><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 49pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3527><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Company may issue preferred stock from time to time 
in one or more series, pursuant to certain authority held by the Board, 
including the authority to fix the rights, voting rights, designations, 
preferences, and relative, participating, optional or other rights, if any, and 
the qualifications, limitations or restrictions, of such preferred stock. The 
issuance of the preferred stock may, among other things, have the effect of 
diluting the holders of the Company&#8217;s common stock and delaying, 
deferring, or preventing a change in control of the Company. The shares of 
preferred stock of the Company are not currently designated by any series, and 
there are currently no outstanding shares of preferred stock.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3528><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6255.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6255 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6255 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6255 
>27</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6255 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6255.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3529><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Anti-Takeover Provisions</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3530><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3531><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We are a Texas corporation are subject to the Texas 
&#8220;business combination&#8221; statute, which restricts mergers and other 
business combinations with certain persons who have acquired significant blocks 
of a corporation&#8217;s stock. The Texas statute provides that, if a person 
acquires 20% or more of the stock of a Texas corporation without the approval of
the board of directors of that corporation, such person may not engage in 
certain transactions with the corporation for a period of three years. The Texas
statute includes an exception to this prohibition. If, for example, the board of
directors approves the stock acquisition or the transaction prior to or after 
the time that the person becomes an &#8220;affiliated shareholder&#8221; (i.e. 
attaining 20% ownership), or if the transaction is approved by the affirmative 
vote of two-thirds of the outstanding voting stock that is not owned by the 
affiliated shareholder, then the prohibition on business combinations is not 
applicable.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3532><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3533><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Classified Board of Directors</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3534><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3535><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Texas Certificate of Formation and the Texas Bylaws 
of the Company provide for a staggered board of directors to be divided into 
three classes. Presently the Board has six members, and each class will consist 
of two directors. The terms of office of directors of the first class will 
expire at the first annual meeting of shareholders after their election, that of
the second class will expire at the second annual meeting after their election, 
and that of the third class, will expire at the third annual meeting after their
election.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3536><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3537><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Liability and Indemnity of Officers and Directors</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3538><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3539><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our articles and bylaws provide for indemnification of 
our directors to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law. Chapter 8 of 
the Texas Business Organizations Code provides that a Texas corporation may
indemnify its directors and officers against expenses, judgments, fines and 
amounts paid in settlement actually and reasonably incurred by them in 
connection with any suit or proceeding, whether civil, criminal, administrative 
or investigative if, in connection with the matters in issue, they acted in good
faith and in a manner they reasonably believed to be in, or not opposed to, the 
best interests of the corporation and, in connection with any criminal suit or 
proceeding, if in connection with the matters in issue, they had no reasonable 
cause to believe their conduct was unlawful.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3540><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3541><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Written Consent of Shareholders</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3542><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3543><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our articles of incorporation provide that any action by
our shareholders must be taken at an annual or special meeting of shareholders. 
No action of the shareholders may be taken by written consent or consents of the
shareholders. Special meetings of the shareholders may be called only by holders
of not less than 30% of all the shares entitled to vote or by the Chairman of 
the Board, the President or the Board of Directors.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3544><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3545><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Advance Notice Procedure for Shareholder Proposals</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3546><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3547><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our bylaws establish an advance notice procedure for the
nomination of candidates for election as directors as well as for shareholder 
proposals to be considered at annual meetings of shareholders. In general, 
notice of intent to nominate a director must contain specific information 
concerning the person to be nominated and must be delivered to and received at 
our principal executive offices as follows:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3548><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3549  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6261><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6256><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6257><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">with respect to an election to be held at the 
annual meeting of shareholders, not less than 90 days nor more than 120 days 
prior to the first anniversary date of the preceding year&#8217;s annual meeting
of shareholders; and</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3550  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6260><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6258><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6259><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">with respect to an election to be held at a 
special meeting of shareholders for the election of directors, not earlier than 
the close of business on the 120th day prior to the special meeting and not 
later than the close of business on the later of the 90th day prior to the 
special meeting or the 10th day following the day on which public disclosure is 
first made of the date of the special 
meeting.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3551><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3552><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Notice of shareholders&#8217; intent to raise business 
at an annual meeting must be delivered to and received at our principal 
executive offices not less than 90 days nor more than 120 days prior to the 
first anniversary date of the preceding year&#8217;s annual meeting of 
shareholders. These procedures may operate to limit the ability of shareholders 
to bring business before a shareholders meeting, including with respect to the 
nomination of directors or considering any transaction that could result in a 
change of control.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3553><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6262.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6262 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6262 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6262 
>28</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6262 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6262.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3554><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Removal of Director</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3555><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3556><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our bylaws provide that neither any director nor the 
board of directors may be removed without cause and that any removal for cause 
would require the affirmative vote of the holders of at least 60% of the voting 
power of the outstanding capital stock entitled to vote for the election of 
directors.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3557><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3558><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Transfer Agent and Registrar</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3559><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3560><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The transfer agent and registrar for our common stock is
Computershare Trust Company,&nbsp;Inc.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3561><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3562><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF DEPOSITARY SHARES</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3563><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3564><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>General</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3565><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3566><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may offer fractional shares of preferred stock, 
rather than full shares of preferred stock. If we decide to offer fractional 
shares of preferred stock, we will issue receipts for depositary shares. Each 
depositary share will represent a fraction of a share of a particular series of 
preferred stock. The prospectus supplement will indicate that fraction. The 
shares of preferred stock represented by depositary shares will be deposited 
under a depositary agreement between us and a bank or trust company that meets 
certain requirements and is selected by us (the &#8220;Bank Depositary&#8221;). 
Each owner of a depositary share will be entitled to all the rights and 
preferences of the preferred stock represented by the depositary share. The 
depositary shares will be evidenced by depositary receipts issued pursuant to 
the depositary agreement. Depositary receipts will be distributed to those 
persons purchasing the fractional shares of preferred stock in accordance with 
the terms of the offering.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3567><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3568><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We have summarized selected provisions of a depositary 
agreement and the related depositary receipts. The summary is not complete. The 
forms of the depositary agreement and the depositary receipts relating to any 
particular issue of depositary shares will be filed with the SEC via a Current 
Report on Form&nbsp;8-K prior to our offering of the depositary shares, and you 
should read such documents for provisions that may be important to 
you.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3569><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3570><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Dividends and Other Distributions</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3571><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3572><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If we pay a cash distribution or dividend on a series of
preferred stock represented by depositary shares, the Bank Depositary will 
distribute such dividends to the record holders of such depositary shares. If 
the distributions are in property other than cash, the Bank Depositary will 
distribute the property to the record holders of the depositary shares. However,
if the Bank Depositary determines that it is not feasible to make the 
distribution of property, the Bank Depositary may, with our approval, sell such 
property and distribute the net proceeds from such sale to the record holders of
the depositary shares.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3573><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3574><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Redemption of Depositary Shares</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3575><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3576><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If we redeem a series of preferred stock represented by 
depositary shares, the Bank Depositary will redeem the depositary shares from 
the proceeds received by the Bank Depositary in connection with the redemption. 
The redemption price per depositary share will equal the applicable fraction of 
the redemption price per share of the preferred stock. If fewer than all the 
depositary shares are redeemed, the depositary shares to be redeemed will be 
selected by lot or pro rata as the Bank Depositary may determine.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3577><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3578><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Voting the Preferred Stock</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3579><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3580><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Upon receipt of notice of any meeting at which the 
holders of the preferred stock represented by depositary shares are entitled to 
vote, the Bank Depositary will mail the notice to the record holders of the 
depositary shares relating to such preferred stock. Each record holder of these 
depositary shares on the record date (which will be the same date as the record 
date for the preferred stock) may instruct the Bank Depositary as to how to vote
the preferred stock represented by such holder&#8217;s depositary shares. The 
Bank Depositary will endeavor, insofar as practicable, to vote the amount of the
preferred stock represented by such depositary shares in accordance with such 
instructions, and we will take all action which the Bank Depositary deems 
necessary in order to enable the Bank Depositary to do so. The Bank Depositary 
will abstain from voting shares of the preferred stock to the extent it does not
receive specific instructions from the holders of depositary shares representing
such preferred stock.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3581><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3582><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Amendment and Termination of the Depositary Agreement</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3583><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3584><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The form of depositary receipt evidencing the depositary
shares and any provision of the depositary agreement may be amended by agreement
between the Bank Depositary and us. However, any amendment that materially and 
adversely alters the rights of the holders of depositary shares will not be 
effective unless such amendment has been approved by the holders of at least a 
majority of the depositary shares then outstanding. The depositary agreement may
be terminated by the Bank Depositary or us only if (1)&nbsp;all outstanding 
depositary shares have been redeemed or (2)&nbsp;there has been a final 
distribution in respect of the preferred stock in connection with any 
liquidation, dissolution or winding up of our company and such distribution has 
been distributed to the holders of depositary receipts.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3585><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6263.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6263 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6263 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6263 
>29</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6263 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6263.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3586><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Charges of Bank Depositary</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3587><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3588><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We will pay all transfer and other taxes and 
governmental charges arising solely from the existence of the depositary 
arrangements. We will pay charges of the Bank Depositary in connection with the 
initial deposit of the preferred stock and any redemption of the preferred 
stock. Holders of depositary receipts will pay other transfer and other taxes 
and governmental charges and any other charges, including a fee for the 
withdrawal of shares of preferred stock upon surrender of depositary receipts, 
as are expressly provided in the depositary agreement to be for their 
accounts.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3589><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3590><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Withdrawal of Preferred Stock</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3591><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3592><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Upon surrender of depositary receipts at the principal 
office of the Bank Depositary, subject to the terms of the depositary agreement,
the owner of the depositary shares may demand delivery of the number of whole 
shares of preferred stock and all money and other property, if any, represented 
by those depositary shares. Partial shares of preferred stock will not be 
issued. If the depositary receipts delivered by the holder evidence a number of 
depositary shares in excess of the number of depositary shares representing the 
number of whole shares of preferred stock to be withdrawn, the Bank Depositary 
will deliver to such holder at the same time a new depositary receipt evidencing
the excess number of depositary shares. Holders of preferred stock thus 
withdrawn may not thereafter deposit those shares under the depositary agreement
or receive depositary receipts evidencing depositary shares therefor.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3593><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3594><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Miscellaneous</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3595><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3596><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Bank Depositary will forward to holders of 
depositary receipts all reports and communications from us that are delivered to
the Bank Depositary and that we are required to furnish to the holders of the 
preferred stock.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3597><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3598><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Neither the Bank Depositary nor we will be liable if we 
are prevented or delayed by law or any circumstance beyond our control in 
performing our obligations under the depositary agreement. The obligations of 
the Bank Depositary and us under the depositary agreement will be limited to 
performance in good faith of our duties thereunder, and neither of us will be 
obligated to prosecute or defend any legal proceeding in respect of any 
depositary shares or preferred stock unless satisfactory indemnity is furnished.
Further, both of us may rely upon written advice of counsel or accountants, or 
upon information provided by persons presenting preferred stock for deposit, 
holders of depositary receipts or other persons believed to be competent and on 
documents believed to be genuine.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3599><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3600><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Resignation and Removal of Bank Depositary</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3601><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3602><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Bank Depositary may resign at any time by delivering
to us notice of its election to do so, and we may at any time remove the Bank 
Depositary. Any such resignation or removal will take effect upon the 
appointment of a successor Bank Depositary and its acceptance of such 
appointment. Such successor Bank Depositary must be appointed within 60 days 
after delivery of the notice of resignation or removal and must be a bank or 
trust company having its principal office in the United States and having a 
combined capital and surplus of at least $50 million.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3603><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3604><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF SECURITIES WARRANTS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3605><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3606><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may issue warrants for the purchase of our common 
stock and preferred stock. Warrants may be issued independently or together with
debt securities, preferred stock or common stock offered by any prospectus 
supplement and may be attached to or separate from any such offered securities.
Each series of warrants will be issued under a separate warrant agreement to be 
entered into between us and a bank or trust company, as warrant agent, all as 
set forth in the prospectus supplement relating to the particular issue of 
warrants. The warrant agent will act solely as our agent in connection with the 
warrants and will not assume any obligation or relationship of agency or trust 
for or with any holders of warrants or beneficial owners of warrants. The 
following summary of certain provisions of the warrants does not purport to be 
complete and is subject to, and is qualified in its entirety by reference to, 
all provisions of the warrant agreements.</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6264.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6264 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6264 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6264 
>30</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6264 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6264.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3607><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3608><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">You should refer to the prospectus supplement relating 
to a particular issue of warrants for the terms of and information relating to 
the warrants, including, where applicable:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3609><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3610><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&nbsp;the number of shares of common 
stock purchasable upon exercise of the warrants and the price at which such 
number of shares of common stock may be purchased upon exercise of the 
warrants;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3611><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3612><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&nbsp;the date on which the right to 
exercise the warrants commences and the date on which such right expires (the 
&#8220;Expiration Date&#8221;);</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3613><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3614><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(3)&nbsp;United States federal income tax 
consequences applicable to the warrants;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3615><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3616><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(4)&nbsp;the amount of the warrants 
outstanding as of the most recent practicable date; and</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3617><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3618><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(5)&nbsp;any other terms of the
warrants.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 22pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 4.4pt" id=PARA3619><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3620><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">Warrants will be offered and exercisable for United States dollars only. 
Warrants will be issued in registered form only. Each warrant will entitle its 
holder to purchase such number of shares of common stock or preferred stock at 
such exercise price as is in each case set forth in, or calculable from, the 
prospectus supplement relating to the warrants. The exercise price may be 
subject to adjustment upon the occurrence of events described in such prospectus
supplement. After the close of business on the Expiration Date (or such later 
date to which we may extend such Expiration Date), unexercised warrants will 
become void. The place or places where, and the manner in which, warrants may be
exercised will be specified in the prospectus supplement relating to such 
warrants.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3621><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3622><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Prior to the exercise of any warrants, holders of the 
warrants will not have any of the rights of holders of common stock, including 
the right to receive payments of any dividends on the common stock purchasable 
upon exercise of the warrants, or to exercise any applicable right to 
vote.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 23.1pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3623><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3624><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF SUBSCRIPTION RIGHTS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3625><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3626><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
