serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The following is a general description of the terms of 
the subscription rights we may issue from time to time. Particular terms of any 
subscription rights we offer will be described in the prospectus supplement 
relating to such rights.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3627><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3628><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may issue subscription rights to purchase our equity 
or debt securities. These subscription rights may be issued independently or 
together with any other security offered hereby and may or may not be 
transferable by the shareholder receiving the subscription rights in such 
offering. In connection with any offering of subscription rights, we may enter 
into a standby arrangement with one or more underwriters or other purchasers 
pursuant to which the underwriters or other purchasers may be required to 
purchase any securities remaining unsubscribed for after such 
offering.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3629><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3630><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The applicable prospectus supplement will describe the 
specific terms of any offering of subscription rights for which this prospectus 
is being delivered, including the following:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3631><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

qualified in its entirety by reference to the applicable subscription rights 
certificate or subscription rights agreement, which will be filed with the SEC 
if we offer subscription rights.</FONT></P>

>31</DIV>

<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6301.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3645><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>DESCRIPTION OF UNITS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3646><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3647><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">As specified in the applicable prospectus supplement, we
may issue units consisting of one or more shares of common stock, shares of 
preferred stock, debt securities, depositary shares, warrants, subscription 
rights or any combination of such securities.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3648><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>

id=PARA3649><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The applicable prospectus supplement will specify the 
following terms of any units in respect of which this prospectus is being 
delivered:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3650><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:

&#8220;Description of Debt Securities,&#8221; &#8220;Description of Securities 
Warrants,&#8221; &#8220;Description of Depositary Shares,&#8221; and 
&#8220;Description of Subscription Rights&#8221; will apply to each unit and to 
any common stock, preferred stock, debt securities, warrants, depositary shares 
and subscription rights in each unit, respectively.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3656><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK3657 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR3657 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM3657 
>32</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR3657 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA3657.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3659><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>PLAN OF DISTRIBUTION</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3660><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3661><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may sell the securities from time to time pursuant to
underwritten public offerings, negotiated transactions, block trades or a 
combination of these methods, or through any other method permitted by 
applicable law. We may sell the securities in and outside the United States 
through underwriters, brokers or dealers, agents or directly to one or more 
purchasers. We may sell securities through a rights offering, forward contracts 
or similar arrangements. We may distribute the securities from time to time in 
one or more transactions:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 35pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3662><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3663  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6352><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6302><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">

serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">at fixed price or prices, which may be 
changed;</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3664  border=0 cellSpacing=0

sale;</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">at negotiated 
prices.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3668><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">A prospectus supplement or supplements will describe the terms of the 
offering, including the following information:</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3669><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE:

<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6311><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the terms of the 
offering</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6317><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">any delayed delivery 
arrangements;</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica,

<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">

compensation;</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>

10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>

serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6323><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the initial public offering 
price;</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3677  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6341><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6324><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6325><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">any discounts or concessions allowed or reallowed
or paid to dealers; and</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3678  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6340><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6326><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6327><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">any commissions paid to 
agents.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 36pt" id=PARA3679><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3680><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If we use underwriters in the sale of securities, the 
underwriters will acquire the securities for their own account. The underwriters
may resell the securities from time to time in one or more transactions, 
including negotiated transactions, at a fixed public offering price or at 
varying prices determined at the time of sale. Underwriters may offer securities
to the public either through underwriting syndicates represented by one or more 
managing underwriters or directly by one or more firms acting as underwriters. 
Unless we inform you otherwise in the prospectus supplement, the obligations of 
the underwriters to purchase the securities will be subject to conditions, and 
the underwriters will be obligated to purchase all the securities if they 
purchase any of them. The underwriters may change from time to time any initial 
public offering price and any discounts or concessions allowed or reallowed or 
paid to dealers.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3681><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3682><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">During and after an offering through underwriters, the 
underwriters may purchase and sell the securities in the open market. These 
transactions may include stabilizing transactions, over-allotment transactions, 
syndicate covering transactions and penalty bids in accordance with Regulation M
under the Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3683><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3684  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6339><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6328><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6329><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Stabilizing transactions permit bids to purchase 
the underlying security so long as the stabilizing bids do not exceed a 
specified maximum.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA3685><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3686  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6338><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6330><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6331><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Over-allotment involves sales by the underwriters
of shares in excess of the number of shares the underwriters are obligated to 
purchase, which creates a syndicate short position. The short position may be 
either a covered short position or a naked short position. In a covered short 
position, the number of shares over-allotted by the underwriters is not greater 
than the number of shares that they may purchase in the over-allotment option. 
In a naked short position, the number of shares involved is greater than the 
number of shares in the over-allotment option. The underwriters may close out 
any covered short position by either exercising their over-allotment option 
and/or purchasing shares in the open market.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA3687><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3688  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6337><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6332><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6333><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Syndicate covering transactions involve purchases
of the common stock in the open market after the distribution has been completed
in order to cover syndicate short positions. In determining the source of shares
to close out the short position, the underwriters will consider, among other 
things, the price of shares available for purchase in the open market as 
compared to the price at which they may purchase shares through the over-
allotment option. If the underwriters sell more shares than could be covered by 
the over-allotment option, a naked short position, the position can only be 
closed out by buying shares in the open market. A naked short position is more 
likely to be created if the underwriters are concerned that there could be 
downward pressure on the price of the shares in the open market after pricing 
that could adversely affect investors who purchase in the 
offering.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN-TOP: 0pt; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0pt" 
id=PARA3689><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<TABLE style="TEXT-INDENT: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, 
sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=TBL3690  border=0 cellSpacing=0 
cellPadding=0>
<TR>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt">
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=6336><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY:
Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="WIDTH: 18pt; VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6334><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&#9679;</FONT></P></TD>
<TD style="VERTICAL-ALIGN: top">
<P id=PARA6335><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, 
Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Penalty bids permit the representatives to 
reclaim a selling concession from a syndicate member when the common stock 
originally sold by the syndicate member is purchased in a stabilizing or 
syndicate covering transaction to cover syndicate short 
positions.</FONT></P></FONT></TD></TR></TABLE>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: -18pt; MARGIN: 0pt 
0pt 0pt 36pt" id=PARA3691><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-
serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6353.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK6353 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR6353 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM6353 
>33</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR6353 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA6353.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3692><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">These stabilizing transactions, syndicate covering 
transactions and penalty bids may have the effect of raising or maintaining the 
market price of the offered securities or preventing or retarding a decline in 
the market price of the offered securities. As a result, the price of the 
offered securities may be higher than the price that might otherwise exist in 
the open market. These transactions may be effected on the American Stock 
Exchange or otherwise and, if commenced, may be discontinued at any 
time.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3693><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3694><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If we use dealers in the sale of securities, we will 
sell the securities to them as principals. They may then resell those securities
to the public at varying prices determined by the dealers at the time of resale.
The dealers participating in any sale of the securities may be deemed to be 
underwriters within the meaning of the Securities Act of 1933 with respect to 
any sale of those securities. We will include in the prospectus supplement the
names of the dealers and the terms of the transaction.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3695><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3696><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Pursuant to any standby underwriting agreement entered 
into in connection with a subscription rights offering to our stockholders, 
persons acting as standby underwriters may receive a commitment fee for all 
securities underlying the subscription rights that the underwriter commits to 
purchase on a standby basis. Additionally, prior to the expiration date with 
respect to any subscription rights, any standby underwriters in a subscription 
rights offering to our stockholders may offer such securities on a when-issued 
basis, including securities to be acquired through the purchase and exercise of 
subscription rights, at prices set from time to time by the standby 
underwriters. After the expiration date with respect to such subscription 
rights, the underwriters may offer securities of the type underlying the 
subscription rights, whether acquired pursuant to a standby underwriting 
agreement, the exercise of the subscription rights or the purchase of such 
securities in the market, to the public at a price or prices to be determined by
the underwriters. The standby underwriters may thus realize profits or losses 
independent of the underwriting discounts or commissions paid by us. If we do 
not enter into a standby underwriting arrangement in connection with a 
subscription rights offering to our stockholders, we may elect to retain a 
dealer-manager to manage such a subscription rights offering for us. Any such 
dealer-manager may offer securities of the type underlying the subscription 
rights acquired or to be acquired pursuant to the purchase and exercise of 
subscription rights and may thus realize profits or losses independent of any 
dealer-manager fee paid by us.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3697><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3698><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may also sell the securities through agents we 
designate from time to time. In the prospectus supplement, we will name any 
agent involved in the offer or sale of the securities, and we will describe any 
commissions payable by us to the agent. Unless we inform you otherwise in the 
prospectus supplement, any agent will agree to use its reasonable best efforts 
to solicit purchases for the period of its appointment.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3699><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3700><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Underwriters, brokers, dealers or agents, could make 
sales in privately negotiated transactions and/or any other method permitted by 
law, including sales deemed to be an &#8220;at the market&#8221; offering as 
defined in Rule&nbsp;415 promulgated under the Securities Act, which includes 
sales made directly on or through the New York Stock Exchange, the existing 
trading market for our common stock, or sales made to or through a market maker 
other than on an exchange.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3701><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3702><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may sell the securities directly. In that event, no 
underwriters, brokers, dealers or agents would be involved.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3703><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3704><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may sell the securities directly to institutional 
investors or others who may be deemed to be underwriters within the meaning of 
the Securities Act of 1933 with respect to any sale of those securities. We will
describe the terms of any such sales in the prospectus supplement.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3705><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3706><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>Delayed Delivery Contracts</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3707><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3708><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">If we so indicate in the prospectus supplement, we may 
authorize agents, underwriters or dealers to solicit offers from certain types 
of institutions to purchase securities from us at the public offering price 
under delayed delivery contracts. These contracts would provide for payment and 
delivery on a specified date in the future. The contracts would be subject only 
to those conditions described in the prospectus supplement. The prospectus 
supplement will describe the commission payable for solicitation of those 
contracts.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3709><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3710><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>General Information</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3711><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3712><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">We may have agreements with the agents, dealers and 
underwriters to indemnify them against civil liabilities, including liabilities 
under the Securities Act of 1933, or to contribute with respect to payments that
the agents, dealers or underwriters may be required to make. Agents, dealers and
underwriters may engage in transactions with us or perform services for us in 
the ordinary course of their businesses.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3713><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA3714.1>&nbsp;</P>
<DIV style="WIDTH: 100%; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" id=PGBK3714 >
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGFTR3714 >&nbsp;</DIV>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; WIDTH: 100%; FONT-SIZE: 10pt" id=PGNUM3714 
>34</DIV>
<HR style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always; WIDTH: 100%; HEIGHT: 2px; COLOR: #000000" 
noShade>
<DIV style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; WIDTH: 100%" id=PGHDR3714 >&nbsp;</DIV></DIV>
<P style="MARGIN-TOP: 0px; MARGIN-BOTTOM: 0px" id=PARA3714.2>&nbsp;</P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3715><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3716><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>PRICE RANGE OF OUR COMMON STOCK</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3717><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 10.5pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3718><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">On December&nbsp;1, 2010, we had 115,507,866 shares of 
common stock outstanding, beneficially held by an estimated 17,614 holders. Our 
common stock is listed on the NYSE under the symbol 
&#8220;BPZ.&#8221;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 10.5pt; MARGIN: 0pt"
id=PARA3719><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3720><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The closing price of our common stock on 
December&nbsp;1, 2010, as reported on the NYSE, was $4.42 per share. The 
following table shows the high and low intraday sales prices of our common stock
during 2008, 2009, and 2010 through December&nbsp;1, 2010:</FONT></P>

<TD style="TEXT-ALIGN: right; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #ffffff; WIDTH: 1%; FONT-FAMILY:

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3822><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>LEGAL MATTERS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3823><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3824><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The validity of the equity and debt securities 
registered in this offering will be passed upon by the law firm of Seyfarth Shaw
LLP, Houston, Texas. Legal counsel to any underwriters may pass upon legal 
matters for such underwriters.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3825><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3826><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt"><B>EXPERTS</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3827><FONT 
style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, serif; FONT-SIZE: 
10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3828><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Our consolidated balance sheets as of December&nbsp;31, 
2009 and 2008 and the consolidated statements of operations, stockholders&#8217;
equity and cash flows for each of the three years in the period ended 
December&nbsp;31, 2009, incorporated in this prospectus by reference to our 
annual report on Form&nbsp;10-K for the year ended December&nbsp;31, 2009 (filed
March&nbsp;31, 2010) have been audited by Johnson Miller&nbsp;&amp; Co., 
CPA&#8217;s PC, independent registered public accountants, to the extent and for
the periods set forth in their report, and are set forth in this prospectus in 
reliance upon such report given upon the authority of them as experts in 
auditing and accounting.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3829><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">&nbsp;</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3830><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Certain estimates of proved oil reserves for us 
incorporated by reference herein were based upon engineering reports prepared by
Netherland, Sewell&nbsp;&amp; Associates,&nbsp;Inc., independent petroleum 
consultants. These estimates are included and incorporated herein in reliance on
the authority of such firm as an expert in such matters.</FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3831><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

10pt"><B>WHERE YOU CAN FIND MORE INFORMATION</B></FONT></P>
<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: center; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; MARGIN: 0pt" id=PARA3833><FONT

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3835><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times,

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3836><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The Company files annual, quarterly and current reports,
proxy statements and other documents with the Commission under the Securities 
Act of 1934. Our file number is 001-12697. The public may read and copy any 
materials that we file with the Commission at the Commission&#8217;s Public 
Reference Room&nbsp;at Headquarters Office, 100 F Street, NE, Washington, DC 
20549. The public may obtain information on the operation of the Public 
Reference Room&nbsp;by calling the Commission at 1-800-SEC-0330. Also, the 
Commission maintains an Internet website that contains reports, proxy and 
information statements, and other information regarding issuers, including us, 
that file electronically with the Commission. The public can obtain any 
documents that we file electronically with the Commission at 
<I>http://www.sec.gov</I>. In addition, the Company maintains a website 
(<I>www.bpzenergy.com</I>) on which we also make available, free of charge, all 
of the Company&#8217;s above mentioned filings with the Commission, including 
Forms 3, 4 and 5 filed with respect to our equity securities under 
Section&nbsp;16(a)&nbsp;of the Securities Act of 1934. These filings will be 
available as soon as reasonably practicable after we electronically file such 
material with, or furnish it to, the Commission.</FONT></P>

<P style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; LINE-HEIGHT: 1.25; TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; MARGIN: 0pt" 
id=PARA3881><FONT style="FONT-FAMILY: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif, Times, 
serif; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">In addition, all documents filed by us with the 
Commission under Sections&nbsp;13(a), 13(c), 14 or 15(d)&nbsp;of the Exchange 
Act (other than those furnished pursuant to Item&nbsp;2.02 or Item&nbsp;7.01 of 
Form&nbsp;8-K, unless otherwise stated therein) after the date of the initial 
registration statement and prior to the effectiveness of the registration 
statement, as well as after the date of this prospectus and prior to the filing 
of a post-effective amendment that indicates that all securities offered hereby 
have been sold or that deregisters all securities remaining unsold, will be 
considered to be incorporated by reference into this prospectus and to be a part
of this prospectus from the dates of the filing of such documents. Pursuant to 
General Instruction&nbsp;B of Form&nbsp;8-K, any information submitted under 
Item&nbsp;2.02, Results of Operations and Financial Condition, or 
Item&nbsp;7.01, Regulation&nbsp;FD Disclosure, of Form&nbsp;8-K is not deemed to
be &#8220;filed&#8221; for the purpose of Section&nbsp;18 of the Exchange Act, 
and we are not subject to the liabilities of Section&nbsp;18 with respect to 
information submitted under Item&nbsp;2.02 or Item&nbsp;7.01 of Form&nbsp;8-K. 
We are not incorporating by reference any information submitted under 
Item&nbsp;2.02 or Item&nbsp;7.01 of Form&nbsp;8-K into any filing under the 
Securities Act or the Exchange Act or into this prospectus, unless otherwise
indicated on such Form&nbsp;8-K.</FONT></P>
